apps.title: DISH Anywhere
apps.description:
Take your TV with you with the DISH Anywhere app – and watch all the TV channels you get at home on your iPhone or iPad. Enjoy all your live or recorded shows and movies anytime. Manage your home DVR from anywhere. And get access to thousands of On Demand movies and shows from Showtime, Starz, EPIX, and many more!

Key Features:
* Take your Live TV with you and enjoy watching all of your favorite sports, news, shows, and movies right from your Hopper
* Schedule, manage, and watch your DVR recordings all from one place
* Download your purchased shows and movies, and watch them offline
* Follow your favorite teams with the Sports section
* Set up-to-the-minute scores and game info for NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAB, NCAAF
* Pair the DISH Anywhere app with your Apple TV to airplay your show or movie on your TV
* Have T-Mobile? DISH Anywhere is part of Binge-On – so you can watch all you want without using up your data

DISH Anywhere requires a MyDISH account, and a Hopper with Sling or Hopper 3 receiver model for streaming Live TV and DVR.

(DISH Anywhere users that do not have one of the above supported receivers but do have a MyDISH account can still use the On Demand and Live Stream from select channels).

This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

apps.title: Paramount+
apps.description:
Stream exclusive originals, hit movies, live sports like NFL on CBS and UEFA Champions League, all of SHOWTIME® (Premium plan only), and favorites from CBS, Nickelodeon, Comedy Central, BET, MTV, VH1 and more.

- Watch full episodes on demand from hit series like Survivor, NCIS, SpongeBob SquarePants, Big Brother and more!
- Obsess over originals. Watch subscriber-only originals such as 1923, Landman and Star Trek: Strange New Worlds.
- Make every night a movie night with blockbuster hits and fan-favorite films from Paramount Pictures, MGM and more.
- Access live streams with around-the-clock news coverage on CBS News 24/7, scores + highlights on CBS Sports HQ and entertainment news on Mixible, plus 20 live channels of curated favorites.
- Create up to 6 individual profiles for each member of your household. Have kids? Use our Kids Mode profile feature. 
- Save your faves with our watchlist feature, My List. 

Get even MORE on the Premium plan:
- Watch ad-free* shows and movies.
- Stream your local CBS station live.
- Catch the best in live events including March Madness®, The Masters Tournament, The GRAMMYs and more.
- Stream all of SHOWTIME, including SHOWTIME East and West live.
- Download and watch offline*.

Try Paramount+ now. See prmntpl.us/SubscriptionPlans for more details on plans and pricing. Download the app to get started.

*Live TV includes commercials. Downloaded content is accessible for earlier of 30 days from date of download or 48 hours from start of playback. Content availability subject to change. Please note use of the Paramount+ app is limited to the United States. Paramount+ promotional offers for new subscribers only. Live TV subject to availability. Prices shown are in U.S. dollars. Other restrictions apply.

Your subscription will automatically renew after any applicable promotional period and your Apple ID account will be charged the subscription price on a recurring basis until you cancel. ► VARIOUS TV PROGRAMS - Covers all kinds of TV programs, including news, music, international news, TV series full episodes, trailers, talk shows, sports, entertainment, cartoon, lifestyle, pets, cooking, travel, health, language learning, radio and many others.

apps.title: Philo: Shows, Movies & Live TV
apps.description:
Philo's where the best TV comes together in a single subscription! Stream top networks like A&E, MTV, BET, Lifetime, Nickelodeon, & more, explore our library of 85,000+ movies and shows, watch all the AMC+ fan-favorites, and get access to endless entertainment with discovery+ and HBO Max With Ads Plan—all with a single subscription!

Here’s what the Philo app has to offer:

Free Channels
Take Philo for a spin! Watch 110+ free channels of true crime, reality, comedy, news, and more. Save and record tons of content with the 30-day DVR and skip the ads. It’s 100% commitment-free—no sign-up or credit card is required to start watching.

Top-Rated Channels
Subscribe to Philo, and you can watch over 70 top-rated networks live, including AMC, BET, CMT, Discovery, Food Network, Hallmark, HGTV, History Channel, ID, Lifetime, MTV, Nickelodeon, OWN, VH1, We TV, and so much more! 

Endless Entertainment
Your next obsession awaits in the AMC+ library of captivating dramas, thrillers, horror, and more. Dive into binge-worthy series, fresh new flicks, and must-watch originals with access to discovery+ and HBO Max Basic With Ads Plan—all included with your subscription. Add-ons like Movies & More, STARZ, and MGM+ let you enjoy even more premium content, including blockbuster hits, documentaries, and top shows.

Unlimited DVR
Curate your own streaming collection by saving your favorite movies and shows with the Unlimited DVR. You can save currently or recently aired content and rewatch your recordings for up to 1 year. Best of all, you can skip the ads!

Custom Profiles
Personalize your Philo experience with up to 10 custom profiles. Each user on your account gets their own sign-in credentials, library of saved shows, watch history, and recommendations.

Stream on Multiple Devices
Enjoy all the movies and shows you love—anytime, anywhere. Watch Philo on all your go-to devices, including desktop, tablet, mobile, and TV. You can even watch on up to 3 devices at once.

Easy Discoverability
Discover what’s new and trending, browse curated collections, or access your saved shows on the Homepage. Use our handy search bar to get to your favorites faster.

Download the Philo app to start watching for free, or subscribe to enjoy a premium streaming experience.

To find the Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, and Privacy Options, visit philo.com/legal.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: FilmRise
apps.description:
Your next watch just got a lot more fun with Filmrise! Stream unlimited movies and TV shows for free with no subscription or login needed!
Filmrise is the largest independent provider of free movies and TV—offering access to over 10,000 hours of premium content. From laugh-out-loud comedies and gripping dramas to family favorites and genre classics, Filmrise has something for everyone!

Discover a World of Movies:
Watch critically acclaimed films starring Nicolas Cage, Russell Crowe, and many more. Explore blockbusters like The Illusionist, Bad Lieutenant, Robert the Bruce, The Iceman, etc.

Here's why you will love Filmrise-
- 10,000+ hours of free, on-demand movies and TV shows.
- Completely free—no subscription required.
- Add to Watchlist: Save your favorite titles to watch later.
- Continue Watching: Pick up where you left off, whenever you’re ready.
- Enjoy a variety of popular TV series like the groundbreaking sci-fi show Continuum, the internationally acclaimed Hannibal, and fan favorites like Midsomer Murders and The Rifleman. Explore thrilling crime series like Unsolved Mysteries or enjoy timeless biographies and dramas such as The Iceman and Highway to Heaven.

Whether you're in the mood for an action-packed thriller, a heartwarming family film, or an engaging true crime documentary, Filmrise delivers endless entertainment for you!

Follow us for new launches, recommendations, and more:
Instagram: https://rb.gy/1xyd4z 

For more information, visit Filmrise.com

You often spend a lot of time looking for a movie or tv show ? You waste your time watching a boring movies ? you encounter difficulties to find what when and where to watch your favourite movies.

- Smart suggestions based on your previous actions.

apps.title: iMovie
apps.description:
With a streamlined design and intuitive Multi-Touch gestures, iMovie lets you create Hollywood-style trailers and beautiful movies like never before.

Instantly create Magic Movies
• With just a few taps, you can create and share a beautiful, custom video 
• Select an album or group of videos or images and iMovie will create a video for you—no video editing required—with titles, transitions, and music
• Easily rearrange or delete clips in the simplified shot list
• Apply a different style to change up the look and feel of the whole video

Learn storytelling with Storyboards
• Choose from 20 Storyboards that help you get started with popular video types
• Record video or take photos right into each placeholder clip, or add media from your Photos library
• Add, reorder, and delete clips as needed to organize and customize your story
• Apply a dynamic visual style that includes title layouts, fonts, filters, color palettes, and music

Make Hollywood-style trailers
• Choose from 14 trailer templates with stunning graphics and original scores by some of the world’s top film composers
• Customize movie studio logos, cast names, and credits
• Select videos and photos for your trailer or record video right in iMovie

Create beautiful movies
• Choose from 8 unique themes with matching titles, transitions, and music
• Give your movie the perfect look with 13 Apple-designed video filters
• Choose from 11 animated title styles like Split, Reveal or Pop-up
• Adjust any title by changing its font, color, size, location, and more
• Add solid, gradient, and patterned backgrounds to your movie
• Import and edit video captured in Cinematic mode on iPhone 13 or later
• Add, adjust, and delete focus points and modify the depth of field effect in video recorded in Cinematic mode*
• Easily add picture in picture, green screen, and split screen effects
• Select from more than 130 soundtracks that automatically adjust to the length of your movie
• Add sound effects, songs from your music library, and your own narration
• Connect a keyboard and use simple shortcuts to edit movies quickly
• Connect a trackpad or mouse to iPad for fast and accurate moviemaking

iMovie everywhere
• Transfer projects between your iPhone and iPad using AirDrop or iCloud Drive
• Send projects to your Mac via AirDrop or iCloud Drive to finish editing with iMovie or Final Cut Pro
• Connect an external display to your iPhone or iPad and choose to mirror the iMovie interface or display your video fullscreen while you edit**

Share with friends and family
• Send videos with Mail and Messages
• Save to your Photos library in resolutions up to 4K at 60 frames per second***
• Export videos optimized for Instagram, YouTube, and other popular video destinations

* Requires iPhone XS or later, iPad mini (5th generation or later), iPad Air (3rd generation or later), iPad Pro 11-inch or iPad Pro 12.9-inch (3rd generation or later)

** External display support requires iPhone 7 or later, iPad (6th generation) or later, iPad Air 3 or later, iPad Pro 12.9-inch (2nd generation) or later

*** 4K at 60 frames per second support requires iPod touch (7th generation), iPhone SE (2nd generation), iPhone 7, iPad (6th generation) or later, iPad mini (5th generation), iPad Air 3 or later, iPad Pro 10.5-inch or later

raw_data.releaseNotes: • Fixes an issue where setting permissions for Photos library access could freeze iMovie.

apps.title: MovieX: Movies & TV Shows
apps.description:
MovieX: Movies & TV Shows provide My Movies & TV Shows: Watch List - The Best way to track your favorite movies and TV Shows. Simple and convenient application for explore movies, tv shows theirs details, ratings, trailers, cast and much more in one place. Add your favourite Movies and TV Shows to the watch lists and then track the release of new episodes.

Live TV options, tons of shows, movies and more with MovieX. MovieX is the subscription free service that brings over movies, and TV shows straight to you. With MovieX it’s easy to find what to watch next. Connect your favorite services to see what’s trending across all your services. Create a universal Watchlist for everything—even if it’s not on MovieX.

MovieX lets you watch, free Live TV, and more. Popular TV series and news, sports, kids’ shows, international entertainment, and more. Watch TV everywhere with Plex and don’t miss out on your favorite sports. Catch the latest action on the gridiron with our free NFL Channel, head to the pitch with FIFA, or tune into ION to hit the court with the WNBA.

- Filters: select your favourite services amongst available and filter different attributes like movie genre or release year.
- Search Engine: movies and TV shows listed, plus trailers, synopsis, cast and ratings.
- View full information about Films and TV Shows (Cast, ratings, runtime, recommendation, genres and more).
- Discover Popular and Top Rated.
- Look for upcoming movies and now playing in theatres .
- Advanced Search for movies by genre, year of release, movie ratings, duration, actors.
- Save Movies and TV Shows to you watch list or mark it as watched.
- Sorting Movies and TV Shows in you lists.
- Add Notes to Movies and TV shows.
- No accounts required.
- Easy to use

Note:
Currently, our app is designed to provide details of movies and TV series only. While we are utilizing the IMDB Developer API for fetching this data, we do not support streaming of movies, live TV, or any form of direct media playback within the app.

apps.title: Google TV: Watch Movies & TV
apps.description:
The Google TV app, previously Play Movies & TV, makes it easy to find and enjoy the entertainment you love from across your apps, all in one place. With Google TV, you'll be able to:

Find what to watch next
Browse movies and TV episodes from across your streaming apps, all in one place and organized into topics and genres. Discover new things with recommendations based on what you love and what’s trending across the services you already have access to. Search for titles to see which apps are streaming them.

Create a list for all your discoveries
Add interesting shows and movies to your Watchlist to keep track of your new discoveries and view them later. The Watchlist is shared across your devices, so you can even add to your Watchlist from your TV or phone and laptop through Search on any browser.

Take your favorites on-the-go
Your recommendations, Library and Watchlist go with you wherever you go, whether it is out the front door or just to the other room. Start streaming right on your mobile device, or download your previously purchased entertainment from your Library to watch when you're not connected.

Use your phone as your Google TV / Android TV remote
With a remote built right into the app, you can find something great to watch even when the couch has eaten your remote. And you can use your phone’s keyboard to quickly type complicated passwords, movie names or search terms on your Google TV or other Android TV OS device

Learn more about Google TV: https://tv.google

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Flixster - Showtimes + Tickets
apps.description:
Download Flixster, with ticketing powered by Fandango - Available across iOS devices including iPhone and iPad!
  
Stay in the know with the latest movie news, discover movies at home, browse Rotten Tomatoes® scores, find the latest showtimes and guarantee tickets to the right movie at the right time with ticketing to more than 30,000 screens nationwide. Plus, sign up for our Fandango VIP+ loyalty program to buy movies and get movies.
 
GUARANTEE TICKETS & SKIP THE BOX OFFICE LINE: Get your tickets ahead of time to secure the best seats to the year’s biggest movies with reserved seating. Save time and skip the box office line when you scan your Mobile Ticket using your iPhone, with ticketing by Fandango.
 
BROWSE MOVIES + THEATERS: Get the latest movie news right at your fingertips, watch the latest trailers and browse Rotten Tomatoes® scores. Find nearby theaters instantly, save your favorites for easy access & view all theater amenities. 

DISCOVER MOVIES: Movies don’t stop in the theater. Discover what movies are available at home and where to watch them.
 
PLAN THE PERFECT MOVIE NIGHT: Enjoy fast and secure checkout. Easily split the tickets with friends and get paid back with PayPal or Visa Checkout. No more IOUs. If plans change, you can always refund or exchange your tickets. It’s no problem!

GET THE VIP TREATMENT: With Fandango VIP+ when you buy more, you get more. Every 4 tickets = $5 for you. No restrictions. No membership fees. Just rewards. It’s that simple. Plus, score extra VIP perks like free screenings, discounts and exclusive offers.

Flixster’s partners are the nation’s leading exhibitors, including AMC Theatres, Regal Cinemas, Cinemark, Marcus Theatres, Harkins Theatres, and many other innovative theater chains and independent cinemas. Together, these exhibitors represent more than ninety percent of the nation’s theaters with online ticketing capabilities.
 
By downloading, installing & using this App, you agree to Fandango's Privacy Policy (https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy) and Terms and Policies (https://www.fandango.com/policies/terms-and-policies).

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/notrtoo

CA Notice: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act

apps.title: Upflix - Streaming Heads Up
apps.description:
Upflix is a guide that helps you discover where your favorite movies and shows are available on the streaming platforms you already subscribe to.

Upflix is great tool for keeping up with releases and discovering where to watch your favorite content on the largest streaming platforms.

Your ultimate guide to movies and series on the major streaming services. If you're a subscriber to Netflix, Disney, Prime Video, Max, Hulu, or AppleTV, Upflix is perfect for you!

With such a massive combined catalog (Netflix alone has 5000 titles), it can be challenging to choose what to watch. Upflix offers a solution that will impress you and help you navigate more efficiently.
  
- Be the first to know:
You'll receive notifications about content added to the platforms. If Netflix adds a new episode of the series you're watching, you'll know. If Prime Video adds a new movie to its catalog, you'll know that too. Upflix will keep you informed firsthand about the latest movies and series. Did you know that Netflix now has "Band of Brothers" and "The Pacific"?

- User-friendly Guide:
Upflix is a practical and simple guide. Everything is quick and straightforward, with no accounts or logins required. Just download and start using it. The only prerequisite is being a subscriber to Netflix or another streaming service that we support.

- Expert Reviews:
With Upflix, you'll have access to reviews and ratings from specialized websites like IMDB, Rotten Tomatoes, and TMDB, which will help you decide what to watch. If Netflix just released a series and you're not sure if it's good, just check Upflix!

- Custom Lists:
Upflix offers two different types of lists: a wishlist and a list of the series you're following. If you're watching "The Witcher" on Netflix and "The Last of Us" on Max, you can add both series and be notified whenever a new episode or season arrives. That way, you won't miss a thing.

- Discover where to watch:
Not sure on which platform your favorite movie or series is available? Our tool allows you to save time and find where to watch your favorite content. Did you know that "Lord of The Rings" is available on Netflix, Hulu, and Max? And that HBO's "Ballers" is on Netflix? Oh, did you hear that Netflix removed "My Neighbor Totoro"? 
The Roulette is a premium feature and requires a subscription to be used.

The supported platforms are: Netflix, Max, Disney, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, AppleTV+, Paramount+ and Crunchyroll.

All film-related metadata used in Upflix, including actor, director and studio names, synopses, release dates, trailers and poster art is supplied by The Movie Database (TMDB).
Upflix uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
New feature: trivia, fun facts, what critics are saying, and even who the movie or show was really made for. Like your smartest friend, if they actually let you watch.
Oh, and the app now looks flawless on Liquid Glass.

apps.title: Dazofy : Movies , TV Shows
apps.description:
Introducing Dazofy: Your Passport to a Revolutionary Entertainment Universe! Dazofy is not just another movie and TV show app; it's a cutting-edge concept that's here to transform the way you experience the world of entertainment.

Embark on a groundbreaking journey through the realm of cinema with Dazofy. Bid farewell to the ordinary and mundane, as we redefine your entertainment exploration. Dazofy is your companion in navigating the dazzling galaxy of movies and TV shows.

Key Features:

1. Cinematic Journey Planning: Say hello to our unique movie planner, a calendar tool that lets you schedule your film adventures effortlessly. Stay impeccably organized and ensure you never miss a captivating movie night again.

2. Effortless Movie Curation: Keep your treasured films impeccably organized and at your fingertips, thanks to Dazofy's user-friendly organization features.

3. Trendwatcher Extraordinaire: Stay at the forefront of the cinematic world with real-time updates on the latest movie and TV show trends.

4. Cinemas Unveiled: Discover nearby theaters with utmost ease, transforming your movie outings into a breeze.

5. Streaming Universe Uncovered: Swiftly pinpoint where to stream or watch any movie that piques your interest.

6. Instant Movie Discovery: Find specific movies in the blink of an eye with a single tap, saving you precious time and energy.

7. Sneak Peeks and Insights: Get an exclusive sneak peek into movies and shows with trailers and overviews, ensuring every selection is spot-on.

8. In-Depth Movie Intel: Access critical details such as movie length, ratings, and all the essential information you need to make informed choices.

9. Genre Exploration: Dive headfirst into an ocean of genres and categories to uncover the ideal film for your current mood.

10. Fresh Discoveries: Break the monotony with personalized movie and TV show recommendations based on diverse criteria, ensuring a constant stream of new, exciting content.

And So Much More: Explore an array of additional features meticulously crafted to elevate your movie and TV show experience.

Disclaimer:

Dazofy is powered by data sourced from TMDB.org, with all content licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0.
Our app operates seamlessly through the TMDb API, adhering strictly to the "fair use" principles outlined by U.S. law. If you suspect any copyright or trademark violations that do not align with the "fair use" guidelines, please reach out to us directly. Glovi is all about bringing innovation and entertainment together!

apps.title: Lifetime: TV Shows & Movies
apps.description:
Stream your favorite Lifetime TV shows!

Watch your favorites and discover your next binge from Lifetime’s trove of the highest quality original programming created by women for women, spanning scripted series, nonfiction series and movies. 
 
Some of Lifetime’s most popular shows include Married at First Sight, Dance Moms, Bring It!, and so much more.
 
Lifetime Movies cover many types of stories, including Ripped from the Headlines, Biopics, Thrillers, and the VC Andrews collection.
 
With the newly re-designed Lifetime app, you can:

•	 Watch full episodes and clips
•	 Catch up on entire seasons of new and classic shows
•	See exclusive clips and deleted scenes, never shown before on television
•	Create a personalized profile with Lifetime so you can continue watching episodes whenever you want, on any device
 
The Lifetime app is free to use. If your TV Provider is supported, you can sign in and get access to even more content.

This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. For more information, please visit:
http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy

Lifetime content is only available to stream in the United States.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Crunchyroll
apps.description:
WATCH THE MOST POPULAR AND TOP-RATED ANIME ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
Stream new episodes, classic favorites, and anime movies with the Crunchyroll app—watch for free or upgrade for an ad-free experience. Whether you love action-packed anime, heartwarming slice-of-life stories, or fantasy adventures, Crunchyroll offers the largest anime collection online, featuring a massive library of anime shows and movies available on your favorite device. Watch anime legally, free, and in high quality—all in one place.

EXCLUSIVE MUSIC VIDEOS AND CONCERTS
Get access to thousands of music videos, concert exclusives, and special performances from top artists worldwide. Watch unique behind-the-scenes footage, live performances, and carefully curated playlists that bring anime soundtracks and J-pop sensations to your screen.

APP FEATURES  
■ Watch anime subbed and dubbed—choose from multiple languages (dub availability varies). 
■ Create Crunchylists—make playlists of episodes and favorites.
■ Explore every genre—action, adventure, romance, comedy, supernatural, fantasy, slice of life, and more. 
■ Stay up-to-date with simulcast episodes—watch shortly after they air in Japan.
■ Discover Crunchyroll Originals—watch exclusive anime titles created in collaboration with top studios. 
■ Enjoy interactive recommendations—get personalized suggestions based on your viewing habits.

PREMIUM FEATURES  
■ Upgrade to Crunchyroll Premium and save with the annual plan. 
■ Ad-free streaming—enjoy your favorite anime without interruptions. 
■ Early access to new episodes—watch shortly after they air in Japan. 
■ Offline viewing—download episodes to watch anytime (available for Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
■ Multiple device streaming—watch on up to six devices simultaneously with Ultimate Fan membership. 
■ Crunchyroll Game Vault—play exclusive mobile games with no ads or in-app purchases (Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
■ Event perks—Ultimate Fan members get first access, early entry, and exclusive benefits at Crunchyroll events.

STREAM THE LARGEST ANIME LIBRARY  
Over 1,300 titles available, including critically acclaimed Crunchyroll Originals, such as Tower of God, The God of High School, and FreakAngels.

ANIME SHOWS  
■ One Piece 
■ Solo Leveling 
■ Attack on Titan 
■ My Hero Academia
■ Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End 
■ Blue Lock 
■ The Apothecary Diaries 
■ Dan Da Dan
■ Jujutsu Kaisen 
■ Demon Slayer 
■ Naruto Shippuden
■ Vinland Saga 
■ Dragon Ball: DAIMA
■ And more

ANIME MOVIES  
■ Suzume 
■ Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero 
■ Jujutsu Kaisen 0 
■ My Hero Academia: You’re Next
■ Demon Slayer: Mugen Train 
■ One Piece Film Red 
■ Your Name 
■ And many more

DOWNLOAD NOW AND START WATCHING THE BEST ANIME SERIES AND MOVIES—ALL IN ONE PLACE


IN-APP PURCHASING AND AUTO-PAY INFO  
■ Your account will be automatically charged upon confirming membership. 
■ Membership auto-renews unless turned off at least 24 hours before renewal. 
■ Your account will be charged monthly for renewal within 24 hours before the current period ends. 
■ Subscription pricing may vary based on region and selected membership tier.

Privacy Policy: https://www.sonypictures.com/corp/privacy.html 
Terms of Service: https://www.crunchyroll.com/tos

EXCLUSIVE MUSIC VIDEOS AND CONCERTS
Get access to thousands of music videos, concert exclusives, and special performances from top artists worldwide. Watch unique behind-the-scenes footage, live performances, and carefully curated playlists that bring anime soundtracks and J-pop sensations to your screen.

APP FEATURES  
■ Watch anime subbed and dubbed—choose from multiple languages (dub availability varies). 
■ Create Crunchylists—make playlists of episodes and favorites.
■ Explore every genre—action, adventure, romance, comedy, supernatural, fantasy, slice of life, and more. 
■ Stay up-to-date with simulcast episodes—watch shortly after they air in Japan.
■ Discover Crunchyroll Originals—watch exclusive anime titles created in collaboration with top studios. 
■ Enjoy interactive recommendations—get personalized suggestions based on your viewing habits.

PREMIUM FEATURES  
■ Upgrade to Crunchyroll Premium and save with the annual plan. 
■ Ad-free streaming—enjoy your favorite anime without interruptions. 
■ Early access to new episodes—watch shortly after they air in Japan. 
■ Offline viewing—download episodes to watch anytime (available for Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
■ Multiple device streaming—watch on up to six devices simultaneously with Ultimate Fan membership. 
■ Crunchyroll Game Vault—play exclusive mobile games with no ads or in-app purchases (Mega Fan and Ultimate Fan members). 
■ Event perks—Ultimate Fan members get first access, early entry, and exclusive benefits at Crunchyroll events.

STREAM THE LARGEST ANIME LIBRARY  
Over 1,300 titles available, including critically acclaimed Crunchyroll Originals, such as Tower of God, The God of High School, and FreakAngels.

ANIME SHOWS  
■ One Piece 
■ Solo Leveling 
■ Attack on Titan 
■ My Hero Academia
■ Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End 
■ Blue Lock 
■ The Apothecary Diaries 
■ Dan Da Dan
■ Jujutsu Kaisen

■ Vinland Saga

■ And more

ANIME MOVIES  
■ Suzume 
■ Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero 
■ Jujutsu Kaisen 0 
■ My Hero Academia: You’re Next
■ Demon Slayer: Mugen Train 
■ One Piece Film Red 
■ Your Name 
■ And many more

DOWNLOAD NOW AND START WATCHING THE BEST ANIME SERIES AND MOVIES—ALL IN ONE PLACE


IN-APP PURCHASING AND AUTO-PAY INFO  
■ Your account will be automatically charged upon confirming membership. 
■ Membership auto-renews unless turned off at least 24 hours before renewal. 
■ Your account will be charged monthly for renewal within 24 hours before the current period ends.

apps.title: DramaBox - Stream Drama Shorts
apps.description:
Looking for something to watch during your daily commute, lunch break, or just to unwind after a long day? Look no further than our Dramabox!
With our app, you can access a huge selection of high-quality content from some of the best creators out there. From indie films to award-winning TV series, we've got something for everyone. And with new content added regularly, you'll always have something fresh to watch.

Here are just a few of the features you'll love about our app:

- Stream your favorite shows and movies in HD quality, no matter where you are.
- Discover new content based on your viewing preferences and what's trending in the app.
- Get personalized recommendations based on your viewing history and ratings.
- Enjoy ad-free streaming and uninterrupted viewing.
- Create playlists and save your favorite titles for later.

So what are you waiting for? Download our app now and start watching the best short movies, TV series, and drama today!

Note: If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account when you confirm the purchase. 
Unless the user turns off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends. Otherwise, the system automatically extends the validity period. Within 24 hours of the end of the current subscription period, the system will charge the account renewal fee according to the price of the selected plan. After completing the purchase, users can manage their subscriptions and automatic renewal in account Settings.
Privacy policy: https://support.dramaboxdb.com/privacy.html
DramaBox Paid Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula

apps.title: Reelgood - Streaming Guide
apps.description:
Reelgood is here to help you find what to watch and where to watch it. We make streaming easier!

See everything that's on Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Disney+, Max, and over 100 other subscription, TV everywhere, and free streaming services. Join the millions using Reelgood for searching, browsing, watching, and tracking TV shows and movies across all their streaming services in one app

How It Works:
- Select your streaming services from the over 50 available on Reelgood
- Browse and search everything you can watch in one app.
- Can't decide? Let recommendations, curated collections, IMDb scores and Reelgood scores guide you
- Track your TV shows and add movies you want to watch
- Let Reelgood keep you updated with alerts when new episodes are available and movies are added to your services
- Get all the info: ratings, trailers, genres, cast & crew, summaries and more
- See what's free to watch online across over 90 streaming services with free to stream options
- Browse what's new on Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, HBO and others
- Try out Roulette for something random to watch.

Webby Award Winner - Best Entertainment App!

Featured in: The Wall Street Journal, Wired, Mashable, TheNextWeb, TechCrunch, MacWorld

Get in touch and tell us what you think:
Email: support@reelgood.com 
Twitter: @reelgoodapp

apps.title: My Drama: Watch shorts movies
apps.description:
Experience the thrill of unique and original short dramas and films, each crafted to last around a minute, ideal for entertainment while on the move. Perfect for moments during your commute, relaxing at home, or while enjoying a meal out, My Drama offers a quick escape into quality storytelling.

Expansive, High-Definition Collection: Immerse yourself in our broad selection of short dramas and films, inspired by novels and presented in crystal-clear high definition. With regular updates, our collection promises a fresh and visually stunning experience every visit.

Diverse and Captivating Content: Delve into a world of stories ranging from modern urban romances to legendary narratives involving magical doctors, influential CEOs, billionaires, royalty, and gods of war. Our collection is designed to spark the interest of all types of viewers.

Personalized Suggestions: Benefit from our sophisticated recommendation system, which presents a lineup of the finest original shorts and novel-based film adaptations, tailored to the varied preferences of drama and film enthusiasts.

User-Friendly Interface: Our sleek and intuitive design ensures a seamless and aesthetically pleasing browsing experience, making it easy to find and enjoy your next favorite short.

Flexible Viewing Options: Enjoy our content on any mobile device or enhance your viewing by casting directly to your smart TV for an enveloping experience.

Exclusive Access: Gain entry to our unique and original shows, available only here.

SUPPORT & POLICIES

Terms of Use: https://web.my-drama.com/terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://web.my-drama.com/privacy-policy-terms
Subscription Terms: https://app.dashdramas.com/subscription-terms

apps.title: Hungama OTT: Shows & Movies
apps.developer: Hungama Digital Media Entertainment Pvt. Ltd.
apps.description:
Hungama OTT – Originals. Micro dramas. Movies. All in One Place. 
Welcome to Hungama OTT – your one-stop destination for top-notch Originals, lightning-fast Microdramas, blockbuster movies, binge-worthy shows, and engaging audio content. 
From high-stakes thrillers and romance to award-winning short films and snackable mini-series, Hungama OTT brings you stories for every mood, every moment. 

Why Choose Hungama OTT? 
• Hungama Originals: Dive into a bold new world of storytelling with exclusive series across Hindi, Marathi, Telugu, Bhojpuri & more. Featuring stellar casts and gripping  narratives. 
• Micro dramas: Power-packed stories told in under 5 minutes. Quick, addictive, and perfect for on-the-go viewing. 
• Movies That Matter: From Bollywood blockbusters to Hollywood hits and regional cinema classics — find something for everyone. 
•  Audio Stories & Podcasts: From drama and mystery to inspiration and laughter, enjoy rich storytelling through sound. 
• Television Shows: Stream your favorite English, Hindi, and regional TV shows anytime. 
 
Whether you want to binge-watch a full series, catch a micro episode in a coffee break, or listen to an audio drama on your commute — Hungama OTT fits right into your life. 
Big stories or quick fixes. You choose how you want to be entertained. 
Download Hungama OTT now and press play on a whole new world of entertainment!

apps.title: Xfinity Stream
apps.description:
Enjoy the entertainment you love with the Xfinity Stream app! Access is included for all Xfinity and NOW TV customers. Watch live sports, news, movies, shows, and so much more!

Top Features:
• Xfinity TV customers can watch up to 250+ channels of live TV on the go and your entire channel line-up at home
• NOW TV customers can watch 40+ channels of live TV from anywhere
• Xfinity internet customers can watch free live streaming channels and free On Demand shows and movies
• Schedule DVR recordings from any device
• Access thousands of shows and movies to stream On Demand
• Download your recordings and movie library to watch offline
• Start watching right after order, and get your full set of channels and features as soon as your services are activated in your home

Help & Support:
• Features may vary based on level of service.
• Additional information on the Xfinity Stream app minimum system requirements: https://www.xfinity.com/support/articles/xfinity-tv-app-requirements
• Look up your existing Xfinity ID (email, mobile phone, or username) or reset your password: xfinity.com/password
• Learn more about 'Do Not Sell My Personal Information' options at https://www.xfinity.com/privacy/manage-preference
• Please note: This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsen’s TV Ratings. Please see www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

apps.title: DStv Stream
apps.description:
As a DStv customer you can enjoy the shows, movies and sport you love with the DStv app. Download now and get watching!
 
Never miss your favourite TV shows, sports team or breaking news with the DStv app, watch live on your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV; catch up on the latest episodes and movies or download to watch offline later on your mobile app.
 
As a DStv customer you can enjoy all of these features on the DStv app.
- Watch it as it happens, tune in and start live streaming selected TV channels via 3G/4G or WIFI.
- Missed it live, catch it later by watching a selection of the most popular shows, sport highlights, and movies on Catch Up.
- Don’t want to use mobile data to watch shows or movies, download up to 25 videos on Catch Up while on WIFI to enjoy offline later across 4 mobile devices.
- Want your own experience based on the sport, shows and movies you like to watch, setup up to 6 profiles to personalise each family members viewing experience.
- Want to plan your viewing in advance, add Catch Up items to your watchlist to come back to later or access the full 8-day TV Guide and set reminders to arrange your viewing.
- Need to keep the kids entertained, our Kids section on the mobile app is a safe and fun viewing environment with PIN controlled access so your kids can enjoy the coolest shows and movies unattended.
 
The DStv mobile app gives you the freedom to watch your best-loved DStv entertainment when you’re on the move.
 
If you don’t have DStv, no problem, just download the app, sign-up, and start watching our selection of free live streaming channels and video on your iPhone, iPad or Apple TV (available in South Africa only). As long as you’ve got the data, you’re good to go.
 
*The Live TV and Catch Up content on the DStv app will be as per your subscription package and country. Due to geo-blocking this content can only be played within the countries in the DStv territories.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’re always looking for ways to make your streaming experience better, faster, and more enjoyable. With these latest updates, you’ll have more control, better navigation, and fewer interruptions - so you can focus on what really matters: watching your favourite shows and channels.
 
Easier access to PVR channels
Look out for the new PVR cloud tag in the Live TV channel list and player section on iOS. Quickly find and enjoy channels that support recording with ease.
 
A fresh look for Live TV!
We’ve redesigned the Live TV section to be more intuitive and user-friendly. Expect a refreshed interface, faster navigation, and a more seamless browsing experience. 
Want a quick view of what's on next? Press and hold the OK button to instantly access a 24-hour channel lineup, making it easier to plan your next watch.
 
We’re always working behind the scenes to fix bugs, improve performance, and enhance your viewing experience, ensuring seamless entertainment every time. Thank you for using DStv Stream. We hope these updates make your streaming experience even more enjoyable and reliable - stay tuned for more improvements in future updates.

apps.title: Eros Now
apps.description:
Searching for an entertainment partner? Look no further! Eros Now with its library of 13,000+ Online Movies, Original Web Series & Films, TV Shows, Quickies, and over 2.5 Lakh Music Titles is here to keep boredom at bay. Producers and curators of some of the best of Indian entertainment, we have content across genres in 16 languages for a family of fans in 150+ countries around the world. 

As your 24X7 entertainment partners, we offer:

• The Best of Bollywood:
With action-packed blockbusters such as Halahal, Singham Returns, Bajirao Mastani and Dabangg 3 and rib-tickling comedies such as Vicky Donor and Housefull 3, Eros Now’s library of 13,000+ titles is the largest Bollywood movie collection in India.

Need some entertainment on a Friday night? Press play on our #horror collection. Looking for inspiration? We’ve got your back! Watch movies such as Mukkabaaz and English Vinglish. Missing college? Take a trip down memory lane with our vast retro collection of hits from the ‘90s, ‘80s, ‘70s and ‘60s. 

• Language no bar:
Looking to explore beyond a single language? Eros Now presents a diverse collection of films in languages including Tamil, Bengali, Marathi and Punjabi all combined in one single entertainment app. We are also proud to present a catalogue of para-dubbed Bollywood mega hits such as Bajirao Mastani and Devdas in languages including Russian, Polish and Swahili.

• Eros Now Original Series & Films:
Eros Now’s ever-expanding library of high-rated web-series will keep you glued to your screen. Watch gritty, mind-bending thrillers such as Flesh, Flip and Smoke; chuckle-inducing titles such as Metro Park and Side Hero or inspirational original series such as Modi - Journey of a Common Man. 

• Eros Now Quickies:
Running short on time? No worries. Watch the Quickie version of movies & series on the go! Savour our collection of heart-warming short films such as Soulsathi.

• Eros Music:
Unwind after a long day with one of our 2.5 lakh+ music tracks, curated into playlists that suit your taste and mood. Listen to top hit songs online by music artists such as AR Rahman, Sonu Nigam, Sunidhi Chauhan, Mohit Chauhan and discover new tunes to groove to.

• Always user first:
With a built-in search panel, navigation tabs and genre-wise selections Eros Now’s is an interface that is easy to learn and use. Be it for millennials or our Gen X veterans, with the Eros Now app, entertainment in the form of a hit movie or series is one click away for one and all!

Use the iTunes Subscription to upgrade to Eros Now Premium and unlock features such as:
• Our full film and TV catalogue
• Movie with multiple subtitles
• Unlimited movie downloads for offline playback
• Stream Movies in HD Quality
• A watchlist for your favourite entertainment titles
• A unique space to share your favourite Eros Now moments



Eros Now Premium subscription terms:
Get your Eros Now Premium monthly or annual subscription through the app. If you choose to subscribe, you will be charged a price per month (or year) according to your country and plan. The price will be shown in the app before you complete the payment. Your Eros Now Premium subscription will be charged through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase as a recurring transaction. Your subscription will automatically renew at the current price unless you cancel your account at least 24 hours before the end of your current subscription period. You can manage your subscription, cancel anytime or turn off auto-renewal by accessing iTunes in your Account Settings. No cancellation of your current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period.

Eros Now Terms of Use: https://erosnow.com/termsofuse

Eros Now Privacy Policy: https://erosnow.com/privacypolicy

For assistance with Eros Now, please contact support@erosnow.com.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: Xumo Play: Stream TV & Movies
apps.description:
Xumo Play is a free streaming service that unlocks endless entertainment including 350+ live channels with movies, TV shows, news and sports. apps.title: Atom - Movie Tickets & Times
apps.description:
Everyone’s Favorite Movie Ticket App. Over 147K 5-Star Reviews!

Atom is the only mobile movie ticketing app that lets you buy movie tickets, make movie plans with friends & get a VIP experience at the theater so you never wait in line. Find all the latest new and upcoming movies, watch trailers, read reviews, add movies to your watchlist & browse showtimes directly from the app. When you get to the movie theater, skip the box office line & scan your digital movie ticket with your iPhone or Apple Watch.

ATOM LETS YOU…
•	BUY MOVIE TICKETS & SKIP THE LINES: Get tickets ahead of time & reserve your seats with a few easy taps — no waiting at the box office.
•	PRE-ORDER CONCESSIONS: Add your favorite snacks to your order & pick them up at an express lane (at participating locations).
•      WATCH MOVIE TRAILERS: Watch movie trailers right from the movie posters or from the Trailers Tab.
•      ADD MOVIES TO YOUR WATCHLIST: Get notified when tickets go on sale.
•	PLAN A MOVIE NIGHT: Invite friends, pay separately & send your seat assignment with a few taps. No more group texts.
•	LINK THEATER LOYALTY ACCOUNTS: Connect your favorite loyalty accounts to earn points when you buy tickets on Atom. 
•	RECEIVE EXCLUSIVE MOVIE OFFERS: Stay in the know on special movie ticket discounts and promotions.

PLUS, ATOM’S BIG ON CONVENIENCE
•	Pay how you want: Credit Card, Apple Pay, PayPal, Venmo, and Amazon Pay

Introducing the updated Cinemark Theatres app. Enjoy easy access to showtimes, movie tickets & info, and the Cinemark Movie Rewards program!

With the Cinemark app you can:
• Get tickets in advance
• Reserve your seats
• Access your Cinemark Movie Rewards account
• Browse your favorite theatres
• View your Gift Card balance
• View ticket purchase history

Cinemark Theatres offer additional amenities at select movie theatres including:
• Comfortable Luxury Loungers recliners
• More food and drink options, your favorite concession items, as well as dine-in options
• More ways to watch your favorite movies in Cinemark XD, RealD 3D, IMAX, and D-Box

Cinemark now presents Cinemark Movie Rewards: Your Path to Free Tickets & More! Become a Movie Fan for free and enjoy: 
• Earn 1 point per $1 Spent
• Access member exclusives, advance screenings, and tickets
• Redeem points for rewards, tickets, concessions, and more

You can also upgrade to Cinemark Movie Club, the Movie-Lover’s Membership, and get more:
• One 2D ticket per month*
• Unused tickets roll over
• 20% off concessions
• Waived online fees
*Visit cinemark.com/movieclub for details

If you experience app-related issues please click on More > Guest Services > Contact to report it. 

Download the updated Cinemark app today!

apps.title: Queue - Find Movies & Shows
apps.description:
Do you love watching movies and shows? You've come to the right place.

Queue is the easiest and most fun way to track your movies and shows, discover new things to watch, see where things are available to stream, and share what you're watching with your friends. Whether you're watching alone, with a friend, or planning movie night with someone special, let us be your ultimate companion to what you're watching. Queue is your guide to TV and movies, streaming and in theaters.

*See where anything is available to stream, no matter where you are in the world. Queue supports 100+ countries and 200+ streaming services
*Connect your streaming services and automatically pull in your full watch history and everything you're currently watching
*Watch trailers - explore a stream of trailers through the Explore tab to see what's new In Theaters, Coming Soon, Now Streaming, and more
*If you've been tracking on your phone what you want to watch, Copy and Paste your list from Notes, spreadsheet, anything, and in seconds it'll appear on your Queue. Upgrade your watchlist!
*Add the Friends Widget to your homescreen to see what your friends are watching. Works best when you both sync your streaming services!
*View all your upcoming premieres and episodes airings on one beautiful calendar view
*Create custom lists to show off your favorites or help keep your organized. You can even invite friends or partners to collaborate on your lists together!
*Swipe with a friend to help you agree on something to watch, or swipe alone build up your Queue
*Don't know what to watch? Use the Spinner to help you decide 
*Never miss a movie or series again with notifications to remind you when titles premiere and new seasons air
*Track your series - we have all the air dates for seasons and episodes to help you stay up to date 
*Unlock fun badges through different challenges in the app

Keep in mind we aren't a streaming service - you still need to have access to streaming services in order to watch the movies and shows you discover on Queue. But if you have streaming services like Netflix, Prime Video, Disney+ and more, you'll love how Queue keeps your organized. Whether you watch on a phone, television, computer, or tablet, Queue is the best companion for watching. Become the most knowledge movie and show person in your friend group without leaving the sofa. 

We’d love to hear from you! We try to respond to all support emails as quickly as possible. Send your questions, feedback, or just say hi at info@queue.co. 

What’s in your Queue? 

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Queue's navigation has been updated with a beautiful Liquid Glass for iOS 26 users.

Enjoy a refreshed Trailer scrolling experience on the Explore tab, with numbered rankings in some areas and a brand new "Top Movies" section. Discover the most popular films of the century, watch their trailers, and see where you can watch them, all in one place.

Under Advanced Settings, adjust if the app opens to your Queue or to the Explore page to discover new trailers.

apps.title: STARZ ON
apps.description:
STARZPLAY — One App. Endless Entertainment.
Explore a world of movies, series, and live TV channels at your fingertips. Watch for free, or upgrade to STARZPLAY MAX to unlock exclusive blockbusters, original productions, and the biggest live sports — all in one app.
Enjoy Free Entertainment
Enjoy a vast library of ad-supported movies, series, and documentaries — no registration or subscription required.
Stream Free TV Channels
Enjoy 50+ live and digital channels curated for every taste. Watch nonstop movie channels, stay updated with the latest news, binge game show channels, or explore fan-favorite celebrity channels dedicated to iconic stars and their legendary work.
Go Premium with STARZPLAY MAX

Unlock unlimited, ad-free access to Hollywood hits, the latest originals, Arabic and Turkish favorites, anime, documentaries, same-time-as-the-US series, kids’ programs, and live sports.

Stream STARZPLAY Originals like Harley, Kaboos, and Million Dollar Listing UAE, or fan-favorites like Young Sheldon, Kurulus: Osman, The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon, The Walking Dead: Dead City, El Turco, The Good Doctor, Naruto and The Flash. 

Plus live sports including Serie A, UFC, PFL, ICC T20 World Cup , IPL, Six Nations, PGA Tour Golf, AEW, boxing and more.

Explore the STARZPLAY Store to buy or rent direct-from-cinema releases — and watch them anytime, anywhere, bringing the latest blockbusters straight to your screen.

Key Features

Stream your way: Watch for free now or upgrade for premium content and live sports. Buy or rent the latest cinema releases or browse live/digital channels.
Extensive library: From timeless classics to new releases across genres.
Personalized recommendations: Tailored to your taste to keep your feed fresh.
Multiple devices: Compatible with phones, tablets, TVs, and desktops. Register up to 5 devices, stream on 2 simultaneously.
4K / Full HD & offline mode: Stream in top quality or download for offline viewing.
Seamless experience: An intuitive interface that makes discovery and watching effortless.

Join STARZPLAY and enjoy free and premium entertainment — all in one app. Download now and start watching!

Privacy Policy: https://starzplay.com/en/privacypolicy
Terms & Conditions: https://starzplay.com/en/termsandconditions

apps.title: StardustTV - Short Drama&Movie
apps.description:
Step into the world of StardustTV, where original short dramas and cinematic stories come to life. Designed for the modern viewer who appreciates the art of storytelling, StardustTV offers a premium viewing experience unlike any other.     
 
Rich and Varied Content Collection 
Explore an expansive library of short dramas and films, each adapted from renowned literary works. From heartwarming romances to spine-chilling psychological thrillers, every story is meticulously crafted to ignite your imagination and keep you on the edge of your seat.

Tailored Content Suggestions
With state-of-the-art algorithms, StardustTV’s recommendation engine learns your viewing habits and preferences, delivering personalized content that truly speaks to you. Enjoy a bespoke viewing experience with suggestions that match your unique tastes.

Sophisticated and User-Friendly Interface
StardustTV’s interface marries elegance with ease of use. Navigate effortlessly through our extensive library with a design that is as beautiful as it is practical, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable browsing experience.

Flawless Streaming Performance
Indulge in high-definition streaming with virtually no lag. StardustTV promises a smooth, uninterrupted viewing experience, so you can fully immerse yourself in every moment of your favorite dramas and films.

The Premier Destination for Quality Viewing
For those who seek more than just entertainment, StardustTV is your ultimate destination. Dive into a world of compelling short dramas and films, and elevate your viewing experience to new heights with StardustTV.

Follow Us on Social Media
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@StardustTVapp
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@stardusttvapp
Notice:
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Subscription privileges: While your subscription is active, you can watch all stories for free.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. The subscription is valid for 7 days.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew. You will be charged within 24 hours before the start of each subscription period until you cancel your subscription.
Cancellation: On iOS devices, you can cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal date by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > Stardusttv.
The subscription is billed weekly. The actual price may vary by region.


Terms of Service: https://us-prod-app-h5.stardusttv.cc/UserAgreement.html
Privacy Policy: https://us-prod-app-h5.stardusttv.cc/Privacy.html

raw_data.releaseNotes: We've made some improvements and fixed a few issues to make your experience even better. Update now for a smoother ride!

Cancellation: On iOS devices, you can cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal date by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > Stardusttv.
The subscription is billed weekly. The actual price may vary by region.

Privacy Policy: https://us-prod-app-h5.stardusttv.cc/Privacy.html

apps.title: Rotten Tomatoes - Movies & TV
apps.description:
Find something Fresh! Discover what to watch, read reviews and build watchlists.

Join a vibrant community of movie and TV lovers. Rotten Tomatoes connects you with critics, celebrities, and even your friends, creating a space to share opinions and discover new favorites together. Read the reviews, check the scores, find movie news, and even ask aRTi, your higher-intelligence search assistant, what to watch next.  
 
With Rotten Tomatoes, you can: 
 
• Discover what to watch with the world’s most trusted and recognized source of movie and TV show reviews, scores, and ratings with help from aRTi.
• Find where to watch movies and TV series on streaming platforms and in theaters.
• Curate personal watchlists so you can always share your favorites.
• Fill your social feed with voices you trust for their takes on the latest titles.
• View Tomatometer and Popcornmeter scores to know if something is Fresh, Rotten, Hot, or Stale.
• Leave reviews and ratings to let your voice be heard.
• Watch trailers, interviews, and news on your favorite franchises and stars.
 
Enter your own world of entertainment with the free Rotten Tomatoes app—and discover something Fresh. 
 
About Rotten Tomatoes
As the world’s most trusted and recognized source of movie and TV reviews, Rotten Tomatoes and the Tomatometer score have served as the most reliable home of entertainment recommendations for over 25 years. We offer authentic reactions in a broad range of reviews from professional critics and everyday fans alike in addition to helpful, easily digestible what-to-watch roundups. Not only that, but we help build anticipation and provide fans with access to first look entertainment previews, trailers, behind-the-scenes exclusives, and more, as well as original editorial features, fun and informative video series, and even books and games. If you're an entertainment fan looking for a diverse range of perspectives curated in an easy-to-understand format, we’ll help you find what you’re in the mood for and open your eyes to new things to enjoy.

By downloading, installing & using this App, you agree to Fandango's Privacy Policy (https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy) and Terms and Policies (https://www.fandango.com/policies/terms-and-policies).

Ad Choices: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/cookies#accordionheader3

Your Privacy Choices: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/notrtoo

CA Notice: https://www.versantprivacy.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act

Thanks for using our app! For customer support, please visit: https://www.fandango.com/help

apps.title: LiteTV - Short Dramas & Movies
apps.description:
LiteTV – Instant Entertainment, Zero Wait
Bored of hour-long videos? Drowning in endless scrolling?
It’s time for something faster, funnier, and smarter.
Welcome to LiteTV — your go-to micro-entertainment hub with premium content under 2 minutes, personalized just for you.
With over 8,000 episodes spanning genres like romance, thriller, comedy, and fantasy, there’s always something to match your mood.
Say goodbye to buffering and boredom.
Say hello to LiteTV.

Hit Stories You Can’t Miss
[30 Days Swapping Lives with a Mafia Boss]
A car crash turns two lives upside down.
A high-society heiress wakes up in the body of a feared mafia boss.
The gangster sent to kidnap her? Now trapped in her body.
They must fake each other's lives in a world of crime, stilettos, secrets—and sparks.
Mistrust, mistaken identity, and a love they never saw coming.

[Love You Beyond Six Months]
Janitor Sarah Milton and billionaire Daniel Rodney marry in a flash—but both want out.
Stuck in a six-month cooling-off period, they fake a life together while hiding their truths.
Then comes Matt, Sarah's first love… and the secret Daniel never saw coming.
Can a contract marriage turn into something real—or will their six months end in goodbye?

[Royal Heir Breaks My Heart in a Warzone]
ER doctor Charlie joins a warzone medical mission and unexpectedly reunites with Harry - her long-lost lover who's now a military officer.
The shocking truth emerges: he's a prince, and the child she's raised alone is his.
Amid battlefield perils and resurfaced betrayals, can their love survive the ultimate test?
A wartime romance where a doctor and a soldier-prince get a second chance at love.

What is LiteTV?
LiteTV is the AI-powered micro-entertainment platform built for the way we live today. Whether you're on a coffee break, stuck in traffic, or just looking for a quick mood boost, LiteTV delivers highly-curated stories that hit fast and stick hard.
From romantic chaos to adrenaline-pumping drama, every clip is:

Under 2 minutes
Hyper-personalized by AI
Designed for your daily fragments of free time
Because life moves fast—and your content should too.
Why LiteTV?
AI-Smart Content Engine
Gets sharper the more you watch. Your taste, your feed, your rules.
Exclusive Originals, Updated Weekly
New creator-driven shows and dramas drop every week. You'll never run out of fresh twists.
Made for Life in Motion
Whether you're on the subway or in line for coffee, turn waiting time into laughing time.
Data-Friendly Playback
Optimized for low-data mode, so you can stream smooth even with weak signal or limited plan.
Blockbuster-Quality Stories
Experience cinematic storytelling, heart-racing edits, and premium visuals—all in under 2 minutes.

What People Are Saying
"LiteTV is the only app that respects my time and keeps me entertained. It’s like mini Netflix on steroids." – @DigitalWave
"These clips go from drama to LOL in seconds. Perfect for my short attention span." – @StreamSniper

Join the LiteTV Revolution
Life’s too short for long videos.
Tap, watch, laugh, repeat.
Follow Us:
TikTok @litetv_app
Instagram @litetv_ceo1
YouTube @LiteTVApp
Facebook LiteTV Official

Terms of Service [https://www.topinnovations.co/terms.html]
Privacy Policy [https://www.topinnovations.co/privacy-policy.html]

apps.title: Movie Night - Swipe & Watch
apps.description:
Discover the perfect movie for your group with Movie Night! Swipe through a vast movie library and find the one film that everyone loves. Tap a card to see detailed movie information.

Swipe alone or with any number of friends. Customize your search with multiple filters and create a room that suits your group's preferences. Invite friends easily by scanning the QR code from the room creator screen or entering the code manually.

Swipe through movies until you find a match. No match? No problem! Start again with different filters and options.

Enjoy your movie night!

apps.title: JioHotstar
apps.description:
Welcome to the world of infinite possibilities – where non-stop sports, endless entertainment, and countless stories come alive!

Stream the biggest live sports and cricketing action, catch the latest Bollywood, Hollywood and regional blockbusters, binge on hit TV shows before they air on TV, and dive into exclusive Hotstar Specials created just for you. You can also enjoy global hits from HBO, Peacock, and Paramount and explore the magic of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic. Whatever you love to watch, you’ll find it here—all in one place, only on JioHotstar, the ultimate hub for explosive live sports, cricket highlights, web shows, blockbuster movies & more!

What you'll love:

Non-stop sports. Endless entertainment. Only on JioHotstar.

A. LIVE Sports
• Watch India tour of Australia and South Africa tour of India, 2025
• Enjoy a superlative cricket viewing experience with our Commentary feed and detailed scorecards.
• Football fans, we’ve got you covered! Catch every thrilling match from the 2025-26 Premier League season.

B. Blockbuster Movies
From timeless classics to the latest hits, stream Bollywood blockbusters, regional gems, original movies, documentaries, and critically acclaimed films—all in one place.

Hollywood Movies:
Prey, Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull, Jungle Cruise, Ford vs Ferrari, Free Guy, & classics like Titanic, etc.

Bollywood Movies:
Kesari Chapter 2, 12th Fail, Sarfira, Do Aur Do Pyaar, Tumse Na Ho Payega, 1920, IB71, Selfiee, Brahmastra, King Of Kotha, Apurva, Atrangi Re, Gaslight, Freddy, Cuttputli, Liger, Gulmohar, Shiddat, Sadak 2, Bhuj, etc.

Regional Movies:
Manjummel Boys, Aavesham, Premalu, Kannur Squad, Neymar, Salaar,  Janaki Jaane, Corona Papers, Rudramambapuram, Vikram, Bheemla Nayak, Veera Simha Reddy, Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey, Akhanda, Bro Daddy, Mallikapuram & more

C. Superhit TV Shows
Web series that the world can’t get enough of, TV serials that the nation comes together to enjoy, and titles that are the talk of the town - find them all under the same roof only at JioHotstar.

Hindi Shows:
Anupama, Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai, Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, Aashiqana, Gunaah, & more

English Shows:
Shogun, Skeleton Crew, Modern Family, Family Guy, Billions, The Bear, Only Murders in the Building & more

Regional Shows:
Bigg Boss, Cooku with Comali, Krishna Mukunda Murari, Eeramaana Rojaavey 2, Anurager Chhowa, etc.

Hotstar Specials:
Special Ops 2, Criminal Justice (All Seasons), Thukra Ke Mera Pyaar, Taaza Khabar, Lootere, Showtime, The Freelancer,  Koffee With Karan (All Seasons), Aarya (All Seasons), Aakhri Sach, The Trial, Commando, The Night Manager, City of Dreams, Kerala Crime Files, Human, Dahan & more

D. The Ultimate Disney+ Destination:
Enjoy the ever-expanding universe of stories from Disney+

Superhero movies & shows: Deadpool and Wolverine, Guardians of the Galaxy, Secret Invasion, Black Panther: Wakanda Forever, Avengers, Iron Man, Loki, Moon Knight, She-Hulk, etc.

Disney+ Originals: Ahsoka, Rennervations, The Mandalorian, Encanto, Turning Red, Disenchanted, Hocus Pocus 2, Moana, and more.

If you subscribe to JioHotstar via iTunes, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscription will be renewed within 24-hours before the end of each period at the rate of your selected plan. Turn off auto-renewal anytime through iTunes.

Privacy policy: https://www.hotstar.com/privacy-policy/in
Terms of use: https://www.hotstar.com/tnc/in

apps.title: Lifetime Movie Club
apps.description:
If you love Lifetime movies, then you need Lifetime Movie Club! With a great selection of new and classic movies available at any time, and fresh ones rotated in and out every week, there will always be something new and entertaining to choose from.

Relax and indulge in your favorite Lifetime movies of all genres, including drama, suspense, true stories, romance and teen movies. Stream classics like The Pregnancy Project, suspense like Death of a Cheerleader, or true stories like Jodi Arias: Dirty Little Secret, anytime you need a fix.  

The best part? It’s only $4.99 per month or $49.99 a year after your FREE 7-day trial for all of these great features:

* Stream on your favorite devices
* Download to watch offline anytime, anywhere
* No TV provider needed
* 100% commercial free
* New movies added every week
* Themed playlists
* No commitments, cancel anytime
* Easy billing through iTunes
 
Use AirPlay to watch on your Apple TV (also available for download on the new Apple TVs!) and use “picture in picture” to multitask on your iPad Air.

Note: Movies can only be streamed in the U.S. and U.S. Territories.

Subscription automatically renews at the end of the current billing period. If you do not wish to have the account automatically renewed, you must turn off the auto-renew setting at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period; if you do not, your account will be charged.

Terms of Use: http://www.aenetworks.com/terms

Privacy Policy: http://www.aenetworks.com/privacy
 
Please visit https://support.lifetimemovieclub.com if you are experiencing any issues.

Subscribe to MGM+ today to stream 1000s of movies, series, and more ad-free. Get access to Original Series like The Institute, Godfather of Harlem, FROM, Hotel Cocaine, and Billy the Kid, plus movies like The Naked Gun and A Working. Cancel anytime.

apps.title: Shudder: Horror & Thrillers
apps.description:
Brought to you by AMC Networks, Shudder was built to super-serve fans of thrillers, suspense, and horror. Home to the largest and fastest-growing human-curated selection of high-quality, spine-tingling, and provocative films, TV series, and originals there's always something new and unexpected for Shudder members to explore. 

Don't be left in the dark - try Shudder commitment-free for 7 days and get unlimited access to the full library of films and TV series – unlimited, ad-free, and uncensored.  Watch on your iPhone, iPad, or TV through Airplay with your AppleTV. 

Please Note: 
– Payments are charged to the user's Apple ID account at confirmation of purchase.
– Subscription will automatically renew unless the user cancels at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
– Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
– The default subscription length is 1 month of unlimited access to the full library of films and TV series – unlimited, ad-free, and uncensored.
– Users can manage and cancel subscriptions in their account settings on the App Store.

If you are experiencing any issues, Please visit - http://support.shudder.com/
Our Privacy policy can be found here - https://www.amcnetworks.com/privacy-policy
Our Terms of Use can be found here - https://www.shudder.com/terms

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

AsianCrush brings the best of pan-Asian entertainment to the West, bridging language and cultural gaps to broaden the horizons of North American audiences beyond Hollywood. apps.title: Mannic Movies Now
apps.description:
Welcome to Randiler Movies Box, your all-in-one destination for an unparalleled entertainment experience! Immerse yourself in the world of movies, anime, and TV shows with our feature-rich app designed to cater to every entertainment enthusiast.

Key Features:

    Comprehensive Tracking: Keep tabs on your favorite movies, anime series, and TV shows effortlessly. Our intuitive interface allows you to manage your watchlist seamlessly.

    Discover New Releases: Stay up-to-date with the latest releases and explore a diverse range of content. From blockbuster movies to trending anime, we've got it all covered.

    Cinema Exploration: Find nearby cinema theaters with ease. Plan your movie nights and cinema adventures conveniently using our app.

    Personalized Recommendations: Experience tailored recommendations based on your preferences. Whether you're into drama, action, or anime, Glovi ensures your entertainment choices are curated just for you.

     Versus Game: Challenge your movie knowledge with our exciting Versus Game! Choose between two movies, and vote for your favorite. Compare vote rates and see how your opinions align with the Glovi community.

    Vibrant Community: Join a lively community of entertainment lovers. Share your thoughts, discover hidden gems, and connect with like-minded individuals who share your passion for movies, anime, and TV shows.

Why Rino Movies - EventManager Box?

Randiler Movies Box Scouter is more than just an app; it's your gateway to a world of entertainment possibilities. Our dedicated team is committed to providing you with accurate information, innovative features, and a delightful user experience.

Embark on a thrilling adventure with Glovi and explore the magic of entertainment like never before. Download the app now and let the cinematic journey begin!

Important Information

    Purpose of the App:
    The app you are using isn't for streaming movies, animes, or TV shows. It serves as a comprehensive tracker, allowing you to keep tabs on your favorite movies, animes, and TV shows.

    Data Source:
    This app utilizes The Movie Database (TMDb) library to display posters, titles, cast, crews, and some trailers. We are grateful for their extensive database, which enhances your experience within our app.

    Usage Guidelines:
        The app has the right to display posters, titles, cast, crews, and some video trailers sourced from TMDb.
        For detailed information about content rights and terms of use, please refer to the "Content Rights & Terms of Use" section in your profile settings within the app.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Improve App stability 
- App Optimized
And more of useful features.

apps.title: TV Time: Track Shows & Movies
apps.description:
PLEASE NOTE: You cannot watch TV shows or movies with TV Time.

TV Time is the tool you need to organize the shows and movies you love and keep track of what you're watching! Join 25M+ people and use TV Time to:

* TRACK your shows and movies 
- Keep track of what you’re watching - all in one place 
- Add shows and movies you want to watch across all platforms - including anime! 
- Find where to watch  
- Receive alerts and notifications when new episodes and movies are available

* DISCOVER something new
- Get personalized recommendations based on what you’ve watched
- See trending shows & movies from users across the globe
- Browse all shows & movies by genre and status
- Uncover personal stats based on your viewing habits

* CHAT & REACT with the TV Time community
- Rate episodes & movies
- Vote on favorite characters and emotions and compare to other users
- See what other fans are saying, spoiler-free and read reviews
- Create memes of your favorite moments

* Dig into BONUS FEATURES
- Create custom shareable lists of shows and movies
- View your Watch List and Upcoming shows from your home/lock screen with TV Time widgets
- Customize your shows & movies with custom posters
- Earn badges for watching, voting or interacting with other fans

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Fixed sorting issue with lists
- Various bug fixes and improvements

apps.title: discovery+ | Stream TV Shows
apps.description:
discovery+ is the streaming home of Food, Home, Travel, True Crime, Paranormal and so much more. Watch exciting, can’t miss Original series plus all your favorite shows from the best TV brands. There's something for everyone!

Here's what else discovery+ offers you:
• Enjoy all your favorites from the best TV brands including: HGTV, Food Network, TLC, ID, Animal Planet, Travel Channel, Discovery Channel and more. Channel availability varies by region.
• Must-see 90 Day Fiancé series and other incredible reality moments.
• Award-winning collection of the best natural history series and breath-taking documentaries.
• An ever-growing catalog of new TV series and episodes.
• Full access to watch anytime, anywhere across compatible devices.
• Browse or search with ease across the best in: Lifestyle, True Crime, Adventure, Home, Food, Paranormal, Relationships, Reality, Nature & Animals, Science & Technology, and more.
• Cast from your mobile or tablet device to the big screen with Chromecast and Airplay.
• Download your discovery+ favorites so you can watch on-the-go (only available to Ad-Free subscribers in the US).
• Jump back into your favorite show with Continue Watching or save an episode to watch later with My List.

Content and feature availability on discovery+ may vary by region. Some titles and features shown above may not be available in your country. Language availability varies by country.

Your subscription will automatically renew at the then-current price of your plan unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the renewal. Your App Store account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period. You can manage or cancel your subscription by visiting the App Store or Subscriptions under Settings on your Apple device after purchase. Purposes disclosed in the App Privacy label may vary based on features or services that may not be available in all regions. Discovery+ is only available in certain territories.
 
Terms of Use: https://www.discoveryplus.com/terms
