apps.title: BookMyShow | Movies & Events
apps.description:
Your access to all things entertainment is here!

From epic concerts and the latest blockbusters to thrilling sports, theatre, and everything LIVE, it’s all on BookMyShow. And if you live for unforgettable experiences, this app deserves a front-row spot on your phone!

No matter what mood you’re in, there’s something for everyone. Whether you’re looking for the most amazing big-screen experience for the latest releases, or you want to step out with the gang for the most happening gigs in town, we’ve got it all. Oh, and did we mention that there are plenty of things to do for quality family time, too? From amusement parks to fun activities for kids of all ages, BookMyShow truly has it ALL.

This year looks LIT with entertainment, thanks to upcoming Indian blockbusters like Coolie, Retro, Raid 2, HIT: The 3rd Case, Thug Life as well as Hollywood releases like Thunderbolts*, Mission Impossible – The Final Reckoning, and many more! Enjoy these movies on the big screen and make the most of this experience by booking the BestSeller Seats on the BookMyShow app. You can also get exciting offers from numerous banks and wallets, and get mouth-watering Restaurant Deals that assure up to 40% off at eateries near your cinema.

BookMyShow has made going out an enriching experience with the big events in the country, like Guns N’ Roses: India 2025, Travis Scott: Circus Maximus Stadium Tour, India, Humare Ram, Papa Yaar by Zakir Khan, and Jo Bolta Hai Wahi Hota Hai feat Harsh Gujral. Browse a wide range of events in your city and stay entertained. 

That’s not all! Discover world-class entertainment, TV series, and blockbuster releases like Ab Toh Sab Bhagwan Bharose, Anora, September 5 on BookMyShow Stream - where you don’t need any subscription and can rent/buy a title whenever you want.

In summary, BookMyShow is a comprehensive online platform that allows users to discover, explore, and book tickets for a wide range of entertainment events. With its user-friendly interface, extensive event database, personalised recommendations, and secure ticketing services, BookMyShow remains the preferred choice for entertainment enthusiasts seeking seamless and memorable experiences.


At BookMyShow, we take our users' privacy seriously.
• Storage: We save some data locally to avoid making a lot of network calls.
• Your Location: We use the location data to show you venues around you. No data is saved on our servers.
• Your Social Information: We only need to read your contacts when you need to pick someone from the contacts to share the booking details. We don't save any of this data on our servers, ever.
• Your application’s information & Logs: We use this to gather the information that helps us fix issues that you may experience with our app. We do not save any of this information.
• Your Accounts: We require this to be able to send Push Notifications. Don’t worry, we never spam.
• Your Contacts: We need access to your contacts so that you can invite your friends to chat or join you after you've booked your tickets. We ask for your contact permission for a bunch of features like chat, sharing tickets with friends. Your information will be kept confidential.
• Read and Receive SMS: We need this permission to enable our app to read your One-Time-Password SMS and automatically enter the code while completing the payment. Your privacy will be respected, and no information will be saved.

Download our app for FREE and book tickets on the go. Entertainment is at your fingertips.

For more entertainment, follow us on social media!

Need help? Head to the Help Centre page on our mobile application, and we are sure you’d find answers to any queries that may cross your mind.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
We’ve made navigating the app easy-peasy for you!

Here’s how:
- Get a clear picture of booking & billing details separated for better understanding.
- See cancellation options up front on the order summary page.
- Cleaner, refined look of the information for easier decision making. 

We strive to bring you the smoothest BookMyShow experience! 
To make sure you are always using the new version, turn on updates.

apps.title: MEGOGO: TV, Movies, Audiobooks
apps.description:
MEGOGO is a content universe where everything is just the way you like it. Online TV for free, movies, series, sports, and audiobooks. 

Switch on the good – switch on your favorites:

- Top TV channels. Watch popular TV online, where you will find your favorite entertainment programs, TV series, and movies on TV. Also, news, children's, educational, informational, sports TV, and music channels are here. Don't miss a single episode of a show, stay up to date with important events and watch your favorite TV channels. And check on some free TV online channels.

- Popular movies and series. Watch series, new releases, classic movies online, and top-rated Hollywood premiers without advertising. Everyone will find their favorite genre: adventure, action, detective, fantasy, melodrama, comedy, or horror. Pick a new movie online every day. You can download movies and watch them in the original or other languages and with subtitles. It is a movie theater that is always with you.

- Everything for kids. Choose what your children will do today: listen to fairy tales or watch cartoons with their favorite characters. Online lessons without subscription are available for Ukrainian people. There are also children's channels in English and different languages, so the kids will definitely be delighted!

- Audio. Masterpieces of literature, podcasts, books for children, nonfiction, fantasy, audio fairy tales, and novels. Listen online or download audiobooks for listening without internet. Many of them are available online for free.

Everything for a comfortable rest:

– TV control. Pause live TV shows and rewind commercials while you watch recorded broadcasts. Programs are stored for a few days, so you can watch them later in the record.
– Offline access. You can download movie, cartoon, TV series, and even audiobook or podcast to listen to and watch offline without ads. 
– Convenient search. Use filters by genre, rating, or country to find the content you need. Or try searching by title or actor. 
– Personalized recommendations. Like, comment, or add to Favorites, and we'll create a selection of movies, popular TV shows, or serials just for you.
– Audio track selection. Change the voiceover language and turn on subtitles.

Even more great features:  

– One subscription — different devices. Connect different devices to your account. Watch online cinema and online television on several devices simultaneously.
– No commitments. Subscribe in a few clicks and cancel your subscription easily at any time.
– Support service is available 24/7.

*Depending on your region, the content and features mentioned above in the MEGOGO app may differ from those available. Indeed, some of them may not be available or may be restricted in your country.

Apple’s Standard License Agreement https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Switch on the good – switch on your favorites:

- Top TV channels. Watch popular TV online, where you will find your favorite entertainment programs, TV series, and movies on TV. Also, news, children's, educational, informational, sports TV, and music channels are here. Don't miss a single episode of a show, stay up to date with important events and watch your favorite TV channels. And check on some free TV online channels.

- Popular movies and series. Watch series, new releases, classic movies online, and top-rated Hollywood premiers without advertising. Everyone will find their favorite genre: adventure, action, detective, fantasy, melodrama, comedy, or horror. Pick a new movie online every day. You can download movies and watch them in the original or other languages and with subtitles. It is a movie theater that is always with you.

- Everything for kids. Choose what your children will do today: listen to fairy tales or watch cartoons with their favorite characters. Online lessons without subscription are available for Ukrainian people. There are also children's channels in English and different languages, so the kids will definitely be delighted!

- Audio. Masterpieces of literature, podcasts, books for children, nonfiction, fantasy, audio fairy tales, and novels. Listen online or download audiobooks for listening without internet. Many of them are available online for free.

Everything for a comfortable rest:

– TV control. Pause live TV shows and rewind commercials while you watch recorded broadcasts. Programs are stored for a few days, so you can watch them later in the record.
– Offline access. You can download movie, cartoon, TV series, and even audiobook or podcast to listen to and watch offline without ads. 
– Convenient search. Use filters by genre, rating, or country to find the content you need. Or try searching by title or actor. 
– Personalized recommendations. Like, comment, or add to Favorites, and we'll create a selection of movies, popular TV shows, or serials just for you.
– Audio track selection. Change the voiceover language and turn on subtitles.

Even more great features:  

– One subscription — different devices. Connect different devices to your account. Watch online cinema and online television on several devices simultaneously.
– No commitments. Subscribe in a few clicks and cancel your subscription easily at any time.
– Support service is available 24/7.

*Depending on your region, the content and features mentioned above in the MEGOGO app may differ from those available. Indeed, some of them may not be available or may be restricted in your country.

apps.title: LoveShots - Dramas & Movies
apps.description:
LoveShots - designed for vertical screen viewing, the ultimate app for lovers of short, snappy dramas. With each episode lasting just one thrilling minute, it is easy for you to watch on the go. You'll be hooked on the latest tales from the world, such as modern CEOs, vengeance, thrillers, time-travel, comedy, and more. Whatever trending genre you're looking for, LoveShots has got you covered.

The first few episodes are free, and you can pay as little as a dime per episode for hit shows. Some shows can be watched for free with ads.

Enjoy our content from the comfort of your phone or tablet, whether you're relaxing on the couch, grabbing a quick bite, or taking a break. LoveShots will always be here for you.

【Exclusive Trending Dramas】
* My Family Kicked Me Out, then I Met a Billionaire: Can the illegitimate daughter withstand the stepmother's eviction attempts and find true love with the young billionaire?
* Destined to Three Alphas: How does the adopted girl navigate her fate as she finds herself mated to three different Alphas of the Ursa pack?
* The Contract Marriage with the Blind Master: Can Olivia successfully impersonate her stepsister, deceive Sebastian Kingsley, and escape the clutches of the ruthless man while keeping her secrets hidden?
And more popular dramas coming soon...

【Smooth Experience】
* Vertical Screen Viewing: full-screen, immersive experience to enjoy all the dramas.
* Seamless, Fast loading: 1 second to load, no buffering, no interruptions.
* User-friendly interface: Simple, clear, and user-friendly interface to help you quickly find the mini drama series you want to watch.
* Smooth viewing experience without ads.

【Contact Us】
E-mail: loveshots.service@gmail.com
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBNzoY2g-uOLbNFaHyZsuXQ
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61550192181696

So what are you waiting for? Just download NOW and see what you've been missing!


Note: LoveShots offers weekly and yearly plans, both of which can unlock all series. If you subscribe to any plan through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account when you confirm the purchase. Unless you turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends, the system will automatically extend the validity period. Within 24 hours of the end of the current subscription period, the system will charge the account renewal fee according to the price of the selected plan. After completing the purchase, users can manage their subscriptions and automatic renewal in account Settings.

apps.title: Movies Hub - Swipe and Like
apps.description:
Movies Hub makes it easy to discover, track, and enjoy everything about movies and TV shows in one place. Whether you’re searching for what to watch tonight or planning your next cinema visit, Movies Hub has you covered.

What you can do with Movies Hub:
- Swipe through titles to quickly browse and save favorites
- Use the AI Movie Finder to get smart suggestions just for you
- Check cast, ratings, and story details at a glance
- Create and manage your personal Watchlist
- Set reminders so you never miss a premiere
- Find nearby cinemas with interactive maps
- Access your Watchlist even when offline

Enjoy support for multiple languages

With its clean dark interface and smooth navigation, Movies Hub is designed for movie lovers who want a simple, smart, and beautiful way to track their favorites.

apps.title: TheaterEars
apps.description:
NOTE: Content only available in the United States and Puerto Rico

Join the movement! The TheaterEars app allows you to watch new release films at the movie theater in Spanish. Simply load the app select your movie, showtime and language to get the movie track on your phone. When you arrive at the movietheater, TheaterEars will sync to the movie through your phone's microphone and then play the full movie soundtrack in your chosen language. For millions, cine en Español, is now within reach without the barriers of language.   

• THOUSANDS OF THEATERS AVAILABLE  (United States & Puerto Rico): TheaterEars is available in thousands of movie theaters nationwide.  Simply select your date, movie theater, and showtime and you’ll be ready to use TheaterEars.
 
• ADVANCED RESERVATIONS: Want to make sure that you don’t miss out on your favorite upcoming movie?  With TheaterEars you can reserve your movie before it comes out (on selected titles).  You’ll automatically be notified when the movie is available for you in our area. 

• AT HOME SHOWTIMES: Selected movies will be available for at home use.  

• ALL FORMATS: Use TheaterEars for all standard movies plus all premium formats such as IMAX, RealD, 3D, XD, Dolby Cinema, and more. 

• EASY TO CHANGE SHOWTIME: Change of plans?  No problem.  Change your movie showtime directly on the app anytime before showtime. 

• MULTI-LANGUAGE SUPPORT: Need support in English…en Español?  No problem.  TheaterEars interfaces with its users in both English and Spanish.
 
• RATE & SHARE YOUR FAVORITE MOVIES: Love a movie?  You can show your love by rating it on the TheaterEars app.  Then you can share your ratings with friends on social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram). 

• MOVIE DESCRIPTIONS: Learn more about upcoming and current movies, access the movie summary, actors, and more on the TheaterEars app.

Hundreds of Thousands have used TheaterEars to watch great movies such as F9, Avengers: Endgame, Joker, Coco, and more. TheaterEars is always adding new movies, so stay tuned for updates.

apps.title: Yango Play: Movies and music
apps.description:
Enjoy a library of ad-free and HD entertainment that includes Egyptian, Lebanese, and Syrian movies and series, as well as Turkish dramas, Japanese Anime, international blockbusters, and much more.

Yango Play offers a diverse range of entertainment: from heartwarming family sagas, to blockbusters directly from the cinema, to edge-of-your-seat dramas and thrillers, to laugh-out-loud comedy, to the biggest Arabic historical shows from the different parts of MENA region.

With access to Live TV channels, you can watch the biggest channels in the region, including:
– Al Arabiya
– Rotana
– MBC
– Roya
– Al Hadath

Listen to curated music collections and AI-powered endless playlists with the “My Vibe” playlist, that plays you songs that match your exact taste.

Watch the latest popular originals from Yango Play, including:
– Siko Siko
– One Last Sin
– The Silk Kingdom
– Restart
– Water Hassas

Crunchyroll, the world’s largest dedicated anime library, is now on Yango Play! Dive into a vast collection of anime, from legendary classics to the latest simulcasts, all in one app. Whether you’re into high-energy battles, heartwarming slice-of-life stories, or thrilling adventures, there’s something for every anime lover. Watch Demon Slayer, One Piece, Solo Leveling, and much more, while staying up to date with the newest episodes as they drop. With Crunchyroll now on Yango Play, your anime experience just got bigger and better!

That’s not all! You can also set up a family subscription for yourself and 3 other people who will have access to separate accounts and the opportunity to stream entertainment together on up to 20 devices ranging from phones, tablets, Smart TVs, and more. 

Yango Play terms of use 
https://yango.com/legal/yango_spark_mobile_agreement

Yango Play privacy policy 
https://yango.com/legal/yango_spark_privacy_policy

apps.title: iDrama: Stream Movies & TV
apps.description:
How to choose from so many short drama applications in the era of short videos? Dive into iDrama - your next must-have short drama app.

We have carefully selected a large number of original short plays and local subtitled dramas, and will continue to provide more updated episodes, just to ensure every second of your time is filled with wonder. There are a variety of colorful stories ranging from sweet or tragic love plots and reversal of fate to classical or modern dramas for you to choose from. You can immerse yourself in the TV box, connect with the characters in the play, and experience the real warmth and coldness of human nature, love and hate, and the ups and downs of fate in the fictional plot.

Here are some features of iDrama that you will love this entertainment application.

· Original series transport you into captivating worlds where reality and fiction intertwine;
· HD picture quality brings an immersive viewing experience without missing any details;
· New dramas are released regularly and each one could be expected;
· Personalized show recommendations based on your preference;
· Unlock episodes with plenty of free bonuses earned through daily tasks;

There's a classic movie line: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you gonna get. We would like to say: You will always get your favorite 'chocolate' on iDrama. So, please download this short reel application and start your exploration of fantastic sketches.

Tips:

· Automatic Subscription: If you subscribe through Apple, the fee will be deducted from your Apple Store account after your confirmation.
· Subscription Privileges: After subscribing successfully, you can watch all episodes for free on iDrama without any additional payment within the validity period.
· Automatic Renewal: The renewal payment will be automatically charged to your account according to the price of your selected plan within 24 hours prior to the expiration of your privileges. The validity period of your benefits will be extended synchronously after successful renewal.
· Manage Subscription: You can manage your subscription at any time or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal day. 

To unsubscribe, follow these steps: 
Please open the iPhone "Settings" -> click "Apple ID" -> click "subscriptions", tap "iDrama" under "Active". 
If there is no "iDrama" under "Active", it means you have not subscribed to our service.

Follow us on social media please.
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/idramatv

User Agreement: https://www.idrama.video/useragreement.html

Privacy Policy: https://www.idrama.video/privacypolicy.html

Official Website: https://www.idrama.video

Thank you for using iDrama. We look forward to receiving your feedback or advice via email: support@idrama.video

apps.title: FlexTV: Short Drama, TV, Reels
apps.description:
Need a quick drama fix during your commute, while waiting, or on a break? FlexTV has you covered – make every minute fun and fulfilling!

FlexTV is a next-gen vertical streaming platform, offering exclusive short dramas, reels, movies, and mini  TV series in crisp HD – all the quality entertainment you crave, right at your fingertips.

Whether you're into modern romance, slice of life, suspense thrillers, or time-bending adventures – from Hollywood hits to K-dramas, J-dramas, C-dramas, and more – FlexTV has it all!

Our library is constantly updated, so you'll always have the freshest, hottest drama shorts at your fingertips, anytime, anywhere!

◼Why Choose FlexTV?

"Exclusive Originals, Global Hits"
Discover a world of bite-sized entertainment – from modern romance, urban drama, and fantasy to time travel, CEO power plays, billionaire battles, werewolf thrillers, and warrior legends. Whatever your vibe, you'll find it here!

"Endless Dramas, Diverse Genres"
Enjoy top mini series from Western hits, K-dramas, J-dramas, C-dramas, and Southeast Asian favorites – all fully licensed and available with English, Japanese, Chinese, and other multilingual subtitles. Dive into the hottest global content!

"Fresh Content, Always Updated"
New episodes drop daily, so there's always something fresh to discover. Dive into a world of endless stories, with exciting new reels every time you open the app.

"Personalized Streaming, Smart Recommendations"
Create your own mini-cinema with curated playlists, watch history tracking, and personalized recommendations. Never miss out on the short films you love!

"Ultimate Streaming Experience, Anytime, Anywhere"
Watch on your phone, tablet, or cast to your TV with a single tap. Enjoy full-screen viewing, variable playback speeds, and premium sound settings for a seamless streaming experience.

◼Trending Short Dramas You Can't Miss:
Mr. Williams! Madame Is Dying: Sixteen years of love, shattered by betrayal – that's when she finally saw his true, heartless face.
A Flash Marriage With The Billionaire Tycoon: A drunken mistake ties her fate to her cold, powerful boss—can she escape the sparks that follow?
Spoiled by My CEO Husband: An unexpected pregnancy turns her world upside down – and into the lap of luxury, thanks to a cold CEO's overprotective family.
Abstinent CEO's Pregnant Sweetheart: One night, three babies – and a CEO's family that won't stop spoiling her.
How I became the CEO's darling: Abandoned and heartbroken, she marries in a flash—only to discover a decade-long secret love.

◼Contact Us:
FlexTV Website: https://flextv.cc/
YouTube (EN): https://www.youtube.com/@FlexTV_English
Business Inquiries: business@flextv.cc
Customer Support: FlexTV App – My –   Customer Support, or email us at service@flextv.cc

◼About Apple Subscriptions:
Payment: Charges will be billed to your iTunes account upon purchase confirmation.
Canceling Auto-Renewal: You can cancel auto-renewal at any time before 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period in your iTunes/Apple ID settings. No further charges will be applied after cancellation.
Renewal: Your iTunes account will be charged within 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period, extending your subscription for another period upon successful payment.
 
Privacy Policy: https://api.flextv.cc/h5/privacyPolicy.html
User Agreement: https://api.flextv.cc/h5/userAgreement.html

apps.title: Magis TV - Movies & Shows
apps.description:
MAGIS TV – Your Family Movie Night Companion

Transform your evenings into memorable movie nights with Magis TV. Discover family-safe entertainment, organize watch parties, and enjoy curated, wholesome content — all in one place.


Discover and Explore
• Popular and trending family films
• Top-rated animated and kids’ TV shows
• Upcoming releases and detailed movie info
• Cast, crew, ratings, trailers, and reviews
• Smart search and genre filters for quick discovery
• Save your favorites to a personalized watchlist

Plan Your Movie Nights
• Use the AR room scanner to estimate space and guest capacity
• Create party invitations with QR codes
• Share or scan QR codes to join group watch parties
• AI-powered recommendations tailored to your group’s preferences
• Schedule your movie nights, set capacity, and manage guests easily

Personalized Profiles
• Choose custom avatars powered by DiceBear
• Add a name, bio, and personal details
• Track your favorites and past watch parties

Modern and Beautiful Design
• Native iOS design with smooth transitions
• Dark and light mode support
• Clean navigation with blur and gradient effects
• Optimized for both iPhone and iPad

Privacy and Safety
• All data stored locally on your device
• No sign-up or login required
• Camera used only for QR scanning and room size estimation
• No saved photos or videos
• Fully compliant with COPPA, GDPR, and CCPA
• Safe for families and children

Key Features
• Browse curated family-safe movies and TV shows
• Discover animation and kids’ favorites
• Save content to your watchlist
• Scan or share QR invites for group watching
• AR-powered room scanning
• AI-based recommendations for parties
• Detailed movie pages with trailers and ratings
• Customizable avatars and themes
• Free to use with ads

Perfect For
• Family movie nights
• Kids’ birthday parties
• School or community events
• Family gatherings and weekend fun
• Parents or babysitters planning activities

Why Magis TV
Unlike typical streaming apps, Magis TV focuses exclusively on safe and positive entertainment. Every title is filtered to protect viewers from harmful content. With watch-party planning tools, AR room scanning, and QR invitations, Magis TV makes group viewing simple and fun.

Support and Feedback
We value your feedback. For questions or feature requests, contact us at support@magistv.app. If you enjoy Magis TV, please rate us and share your experience.

Download Magis TV today and start planning your next family movie night.

apps.description:
Welcome to the world of skits at FlickReels! Here, you can easily enjoy captivating streaming skits anytime, anywhere—whether you’re traveling, on the road, or dining out, you’ll experience a whole new level of audiovisual delight!

Dive into thrilling skits featuring were wolves, billionaires, CEOs, sweet , vengeful queens, warlords, and more romantic tales that will keep you coming back for more!

FlickReels Brings You:
【Vast Library • Anytime, Anywhere】
● Freshly updated trending short dramas every day. Stay on top of what's hot.
● A wide variety of genres with fully completed series for effortless binge-watching.
● Exclusive mini-dramas filled with fast-paced, high-energy plots. Every minute keeps you hooked.
【Smart Experience • Tailored Just for You】
● Intelligent recommendations based on your preferences and viewing habits.
● Continuously refined suggestions powered by your watch history and interactions.
● Easily discover must-watch shows through dynamic charts: Top Picks, Most Loved, Trending.
【Immersive Viewing • Seamless Control】
● Smooth HD playback with an intuitive, user-friendly interface.
● Download episodes for offline viewing. Watch anytime, even without internet.
【Engage & Share • Double the Fun】
● Save, like, and share your favorite moments with just one tap.
● Build your own playlists and curate a personal drama library.

● Multiple subtitle and dubbing options to bridge language gaps.
● Content spanning regions worldwide, catering to diverse tastes and cultures.

FlickReels is more than a short drama platform; it's your personal viewing companion. Whether you're a short drama enthusiast, a binge-watching pro, or just looking to unwind, you'll always find something here for you.
Download FlickReels now and step into a brand-new short drama experience!

apps.title: Omni : Movie and Tv Shows
apps.description:
Discover Movies Differently with Omni : Movie and Tv Shows
 
Whether you're catching the latest blockbuster or rediscovering a timeless classic, Omni : Movie and Tv Shows transforms the way you explore and enjoy entertainment. With stunning visuals, smart AI recommendations, and deep content insights, your movie and TV experience becomes more personal, exciting, and immersive.

Omni : Movie and Tv Shows isn’t just another app—it’s your personal movie companion. Discover hidden gems, build your watchlist, and dive into the stories that move you.

Why You'll Love Omni : Movie and Tv Shows

* AI Movie Finder
Let our intelligent AI suggest what to watch when you’re unsure what’s next.

* Custom Watchlists
Save favorites, organize your must-watch list, and never lose track of your movie nights.

* Curated Collections
Browse themed collections by genre, mood, or trending topics—perfectly handpicked for you.

* Nearby Cinemas
Instantly find theaters near your current location.

* Movie Quiz
Test your film and series knowledge with fun and challenging trivia.

* Movie Puzzle Game
Relax and enjoy puzzles featuring your favorite movies and shows.

* Movie Planner
Schedule what to watch and when—because your time deserves great stories.

* In-Depth Movie Info
Explore detailed cast bios, ratings, reviews, trailers, and more—all in one place.

* Elevate Your Movie Nights
Download Omni : Movie and Tv Shows now and unlock a world of unforgettable characters, stories, and cinema—all in the palm of your hand.

apps.title: My Town : Cinema movies
apps.description:
Your movie is about to start in the My Town Movie Theater 

Enter the movie theater and buy a ticket for the film you’d like to enjoy. You get to choose from 3 different movies specially made for kids! Take photos with your favorite movie star or super hero on the red carpet and grab your popcorn before settling down in your cinema seat.

What’s even more fun than just going to see a movie? Running the movie theater yourself! Your friends will be hungry before the film, and you can make them their own popcorn. No movie menu is complete without a drink, so don’t forget the soda! You even get to enter the projection room and run the movie projector all by yourself! Sometimes the projector breaks down and you’ll get to fix it with life-like tools.
What’s even MORE fun than running a movie theater? Directing or acting in your own movie! Make your very own film, you can even direct or act in the film the wizard of Oz that is being shot at the movie studio. Become a movie star in this movie game for kids developed by the makers of the My Town Games.

My Town: Movie Star & Cinema - Movie Game Features
*Many new characters with new costumes to dress up - choose the perfect outfit for the movie premiere, so your movie star can shine on the red carpet
*The movie game offers so many rooms to discover and explore! Starting direct at the movie studio and make sure you have a great time at the cinema!
*14 characters to choose from, many roles to play, including: movie directors, movie stars and cinema staff If you can imagine it, you can make it. Everything is possible in this movie game by My Town
*Create your own movies and show them in your cinema in this movie theater game for kids
*Become the biggest movie star the My Town Community has ever seen

Recommended Age Group
Kids 4-12: My Town games are safe to play even when parents are out of the room. Younger children can direct movies together with their parents, while older kids run the movie theater alone or with friends.

About My Town
The My Town Games studio designs digital doll house games that promote creativity and open ended play for your children all over the world. Loved by children and parents alike, My Town games introduce environments and experiences for hours of imaginative play. The company has offices in Israel, Spain, Romania and the Philippines. For more information, please visit www.my-town.com

Terms of Use: https://www.my-town.com/EULA
Customer Support contact: support@my-town.com
Get Privacy-related information at: https://www.my-town.com/privacy-policy/.

raw_data.releaseNotes: This update includes bug fixes and updated systems. Sorry for any inconvenience! Enjoy the game!

apps.title: TodoMovies
apps.description:
TodoMovies - Your Ultimate Movie Companion

The most beautiful and comprehensive movie tracking app for iOS. Manage your watchlist, discover new films, and never miss a great movie again.

Smart Movie Management
• Create "To Watch" and "Watched" lists with ease
• Build custom collections like "Best Action Movies" or "Movies to Download"
• Rate movies and sort by your ratings
• Add watched dates and personal comments to track your movie journey

Rich Movie Information
• Browse by genres, in-theaters, and upcoming releases
• Explore curated lists by the TodoMovies team
• Detailed cast profiles with actor/director filmographies
• Bonus scene indicators for movies with post-credit content

Powerful Discovery
• Search-as-you-type through tens of thousands of movies and people
• Browse stunning edge-to-edge movie posters
• Watch HD trailers in fullscreen without leaving the app
• Browse movie photos and fan artwork in full-screen

Stay Updated
• Movie news feed with the latest industry updates
• Release notifications for when movies hit theaters
• Celebrity news and entertainment updates

Data Management
• Backup and restore your watchlists as a single file
• Restore from clipboard for easy data transfer
• No accounts required - your data stays private

Global Experience
• Localized in 11 languages
• Global release dates and localized trailers
• iTunes Store integration for movie-related downloads

Why TodoMovies?
Featured by Apple, Empire Magazine, 9to5Mac, AppAdvice, and BeautifulPixels, TodoMovies puts movie artwork front and center with its stunning iOS design. Whether you're a casual moviegoer or a film enthusiast, our app helps you discover, track, and enjoy movies like never before.

Perfect for:
• Movie enthusiasts who want to track their viewing history
• Film buffs looking to discover new releases and classics
• Anyone who wants to organize their movie watching experience
• Users who appreciate beautiful, intuitive iOS design

Attribution: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

apps.title: WATCH TCM
apps.description:
Turner Classic Movies presents WATCH TCM, a service that lets you enjoy the best of TCM, at no additional cost with your TV subscription*. Experience the richly textured world of classic movies that only Turner Classic Movies can bring you. 
 
HUNDREDS OF MOVIES ON DEMAND: Our extensive library is updated each month with new titles, featuring introductions by special guests and our TCM Hosts, including Ben Mankiewicz. Movies are presented UNCUT and COMMERCIAL FREE. 
 
IN-DEPTH MOVIE INFORMATION: Learn more about every title with feature-length articles, cast & crew details, incredible image galleries, background information, complete synopsis and more.

CUSTOM WATCHLIST: Add new and favorite movies to your queue to watch later.

TWO LIVE STREAMS: Enjoy both an East and West Coast feed of Turner Classic Movies. Watch 2 different movies LIVE at any time, always UNCUT and COMMERCIAL FREE.
 
SHORT FILMS: See some of the best classic film short subjects, many specially programmed for WATCH TCM.
 
EXPLORE BONUS CONTENT: Featuring thousands of short-form clips and trailers. Browse stunning, never-before-seen photos from the titles playing on TCM this month.
 
*In order to access WATCH TCM, you must get TCM at home through either a cable or satellite TV package.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Improved user experience
Bug fixing
Performance improvements

TWO LIVE STREAMS: Enjoy both an East and West Coast feed of Turner Classic Movies. Watch 2 different movies LIVE at any time, always UNCUT and COMMERCIAL FREE.
 
SHORT FILMS: See some of the best classic film short subjects, many specially programmed for WATCH TCM.
 
EXPLORE BONUS CONTENT: Featuring thousands of short-form clips and trailers. Browse stunning, never-before-seen photos from the titles playing on TCM this month.
 
*In order to access WATCH TCM, you must get TCM at home through either a cable or satellite TV package.

apps.title: The Criterion Channel
apps.description:
A movie lover’s dream, the Criterion Channel offers classics and discoveries from around the world, thematically programmed with special features, on a streaming service brought to you by the Criterion Collection.

With constantly refreshed selections of Hollywood, international, art-house, and independent movies, plus access to Criterion’s entire streaming library of more than 1,000 important classic and contemporary films, there’s something new to choose from every day of the week on the Criterion Channel. Start with Sunday Spotlights on directors, stars, genres, and themes; Tuesday’s Short + Feature; or the Friday double bill. Try out our 15-minute-a-month film school, Observations on Film Art, or choose from suggestions by friends like Barry Jenkins, Guillermo del Toro, or Mira Nair. Go deep with the Criterion Collection’s archive of special features for context that no other service can match.

FEATURES

- The Criterion Collection’s streaming library, including many complete editions released on Blu-ray and DVD, as well as unreleased titles
- Ongoing programs of Hollywood, international, art-house, independent, documentary, and short films, including thematic programming, director and star retrospectives, and guest-curated series
- Original Criterion Channel series such as Observations on Film Art, Adventures in Moviegoing, and Art-House America
- Supplemental features to deepen your appreciation of the art of film, including audio commentaries, behind-the-scenes footage, scholarly analyses, introductions, new and archival interviews, and trailers
 
To access all features and content you can subscribe to The Criterion Channel on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your iTunes Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://www.criterionchannel.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.criterionchannel.com/privacy

raw_data.releaseNotes:
* Bug fixes
* Performance improvements

The Likewise app helps you quickly cut through the clutter by learning what you like. Along with help from Pix, your personal entertainment companion powered by AI, and real recommendations from real people, you can discover even more ways to find your next favorite book, show, movie, and podcast!

The best recommendations- Personalized to your unique tastes, Likewise learns what you like to give you personalized recommendations every day.- Ask Pix to get recommendations instantly. Pix will get to know you and your preferences which will apply to future recommendations.- Likewise newsletters make it easy to stay up to date with what’s new and what’s worth watching, reading and listening to.

Crowd Sourced Recommendations- Enthusiasts come together on Likewise. Browse and share recommendations and connect with like-minded people in groups you’re interested in. Invite your friends and family and never miss what they’re enjoying.

One Entertainment App for All- Easily and quickly search across all your interests and streaming services to find what you want. apps.title: Hooked TV
apps.description:
Find your new favorite show on Hooked TV. Watch popular movies and shows like Trevor and the Virgin, House Rules, and more. Don’t miss out on these super-popular shows that everyone is obsessed with.


HOOKED Unlimited Subscription:

You must subscribe for unlimited access to the Hooked catalog. The subscription is $4.99 weekly*. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off for at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period at the cost of the chosen package. Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when purchasing a subscription.

apps.title: PBS: Watch TV & Documentaries
apps.description:
Get the PBS app and stream heartwarming shows like All Creatures Great & Small and Call the Midwife, plus new documentary series like Ken Burns’ American Buffalo. The PBS app features the latest news, live TV from your local PBS station, award-winning documentaries, and iconic series. Download the PBS app and stream thousands of full-length episodes anytime, anywhere! 

Streaming and watching TV is made easy with the PBS app. Watch series you love and discover brand new shows, live or on demand, with PBS’s streaming app available on your mobile phone, tablet, or Smart TV. 

Unlike conventional streaming apps, PBS lets you access local TV live! Stream local content with the PBS app livestream and discover your favorite local PBS station shows. 

Stay up to date with the latest news; watching shows like Frontline, PBS NewsHour, and Washington Week. Catch up on your favorite British dramas with Masterpiece classics including complete seasons of Miss Scarlet & the Duke, World on Fire, Endeavour, and Sanditon. Learn about history and science with new episodes of Finding Your Roots, Antiques Roadshow, Nature, and NOVA. Discover exciting musical performances watching Great Performances and Austin City Limits. You never have to miss a show with brand new videos and episodes added daily to the PBS app. 

WHAT DO YOU GET WITH THE FREE PBS APP? 

STREAM LOCAL & LIVE TV
- Connect to your local PBS station and watch your local station livestream 
- Tune in to the latest from your local community on the PBS app
- Stream your local station TV channel live anytime 

WATCH TV SHOWS ON DEMAND
- Watch TV shows on demand with the PBS app 
- TV shows of all genres - from drama and romance to murder and mystery
- Watch a new series and your all-time favorites
- Save episodes of your favorite TV shows to a custom watchlist

STREAM A VARIETY OF CONTENT
- Watch a new TV show or explore videos from the PBS archives
- Stream specially curated playlists, short films, interviews, extras, and more
- Binge TV shows of all genres on the PBS app
- Watch films, documentaries and TV shows

WATCH TV SERIES ACROSS MULTIPLE GENRES
- Enjoy the best of streaming and entertainment with PBS 
- Drama: All Creatures Great and Small, Miss Scarlet and the Duke, Broadchurch, Poldark, Vienna Blood, Grantchester, Sanditon, World on Fire, Call the Midwife, Jamestown, and more.
- Foreign Language Dramas: Professor T, Seaside Hotel, The Paris Murders, Luna and Sophie, and Sisi: Austrian Empress
- News & Public Affairs: Programs from PBS NewsHour, Frontline, Amanpour and Company, Firing Line, and Washington Week.
- Award-Winning Films & Documentaries: Discover new perspectives with Ken Burns, Independent Lens, POV,, and the PBS Short Film Festival.
- History: Antiques Roadshow, American Experience, American Masters, Finding Your Roots, and more.
- Arts & Performances: Great Performances, Austin City Limits, Bob Ross: The Joy of Painting, and Variety Studio: Actors on Acting.
- Science & Nature: Explore astonishing new worlds from NOVA, Nature, Deep Look, Expedition, and more.

WATCH MORE WITH PBS PASSPORT
Passport is an added benefit of station membership. By donating to your local PBS station you can:
- Stream an expanded library of acclaimed PBS programming
- Extended and exclusive access to 1,500+ episodes of your favorite shows
- Watch past and current seasons of popular shows like All Creatures Great and Small, Endeavour, and Sanditon
- Binge watch new TV series and your favorite PBS programs, like Finding Your Roots
- Stream early releases and special collections, like Ken Burns films and Antiques Roadshow

WHAT’S NEW ON PBS
MASTERPIECE: Moonflower Murders
Blake Edwards: A Love Story in 24 Frames
Big Cats 24/7
NOVA: Dog Tales
MASTERPIECE: Van der Valk S4
Finding Your Roots

Watch TV anywhere and stream PBS shows today.

PBS offers all Americans the opportunity to explore new worlds through trusted, educational television and digital content.

apps.description:
From classic titles to new streaming hits, get Korean dramas, movies, K-Pop, variety shows, and so much more with premium multi-language subtitles on this app across the Americas. 

Explore the Extensive Library of Korean Dramas, Movies, and TV Shows
  • Korean Dramas: Enjoy all-time favorites, Coffee Prince, The Heirs, Descendants of the Sun, The Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok Joo, Hwarang, and more titles with your favorite Korean actors. And do not miss on the most-talked-about Korean Dramas, The Penthouse, Weak Hero Class 1, My Dearest, Young Lady and Gentleman, and The Real Has Come!
  • Korean Movies: Discover the most popular Korean movies like Along with the Gods, Train to Busan, The Wailing, The Beauty Inside, A Taxi Driver, and more.

apps.title: Relmvet : Movies & Tv Series
apps.description:
Relmvet : Movies & Tv Series – Your Ultimate Entertainment Companion

Whether you're catching the latest blockbusters or rediscovering cinematic classics, Relmvet : Movies & Tv Series redefines how you explore and enjoy entertainment. With stunning visuals, smart recommendations, and rich content, your movie and TV experience becomes deeper, smarter, and more personal.

Relmvet : isn’t just an app—it’s your trusted sidekick for discovering hidden gems, curating your watchlist, and diving into the stories you love.

Why You'll Love Relmvet :

1. AI-Powered Random Picks
Get intelligent suggestions based on your viewing habits and preferences—perfect for when you don't know what to watch next.

3. Custom Watchlists
Save favorites, track your must-sees, and keep your movie nights organized and exciting.

3. Curated Collections
Explore hand-selected lists based on mood, genre, or trending themes.

4. Movie Planner
Schedule your next watch session so you never miss a movie night.


5. Iconic Movie Quotes
Browse memorable quotes from legendary films and series.


6. Star Look-Alike
Find which movie stars you resemble—fun, fast, and shareable.


7. Cinema Finder
Instantly locate nearby theaters based on your current location.


8. In-Depth Movie Info
Dive into detailed cast info, reviews, trailers, ratings, and more.


…and there’s even more to discover inside.

Ready to elevate your movie experience?
Download Relmvet : Movies & Tv Series now and uncover a whole new world of stories, characters, and cinematic adventures.

Sources & Credits:
All TV show information and images are sourced from TMDb, licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0 : https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0
We use the TMDb API but are not endorsed or certified by TMDb. Learn more: TMDb API Terms : https://www.themoviedb.org/api-terms-of-use

apps.title: SMG Theaters
apps.description:
The all-new Studio Movie Grill ticket app is the easiest way to purchase reserved seating for the biggest movies of the year at your local SMG. Browse movie listings and showtimes, purchase tickets, save ticket confirmations, and sign up for SMG Access to get points with every ticket purchase.
 
• Browse movie listings and showtimes at every SMG location nationwide
• Pick your favorite seats and buy movie tickets
• Skip the line at the box office
• Save your preferences like billing information and favorite location
• Get VIP access to special offers, discounts, and advanced screenings
 
Plus, earn rewards with SMG Access® – the only theater loyalty program that rewards you while giving movies and meals to deserving neighbors in your community. 
 
• Sign up for your free SMG Access account
• Get 50 points within 24 hours of sign-up 
 • Earn points with every ticket purchase
• Log in to your account to check your points balance, rewards, and messages
 
Thanks for downloading and installing our app! We appreciate your feedback and constantly want to improve the SMG experience online. Our team would love to hear from you with suggestions and issues by emailing Guest Services at www.studiomoviegrill.com/contactus.

apps.title: Filmlog: Private Movie Journal
apps.description:
Privately track releases of your favourite stars, curate your personal movie diary and explore a world of cinema.

Filmlog – Free Features:
• Super Fast Search: Quickly find any movie, cast, or crew member.
• Personal Watchlist: Keep track of movies you plan to see and mark those you’ve already watched.
• Social Sharing & Inbox: Effortlessly share movie recommendations, and any filmlog.cc links you open appear in your inbox.
• Easy Backups: Multiple backup options to keep your private movie diary safe.

Unlock Filmlog Plus – Unrestricted Access to All Features:
• Follow Your Stars: Get notifications on upcoming releases from actors and crew you are following.
• Advanced People Search: Explore detailed filmographies and follower insights.
• Custom Visuals: Choose your favorite movie poster and change the app icon.
• Personal Notes: Add your thoughts to movies for a richer diary experience.
• Premium Support: Enjoy dedicated email support and contribute to independent app development.

Important note!
Please make sure to use Filmlog on your primary device (iPhone or iPad) that you always have with you – no registration or account is required, therefor no sync is available.

Your data is backed up via iCloud Backup, if enabled, and manual backup options are available, too.

Do you have feedback? Send an email to: feedback@simonbraun.eu
_________

Attribution: This product uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.

Terms of Use: https://filmlog.cc/terms-of-service.php
Privacy Policy: https://filmlog.cc/privacy-policy.php

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

– FIXED: crashes when opening universal Filmlog links // Thanks Saúl

apps.title: Box Loca Movies Flix TV Shows
apps.description:
Search and Track movies to share a movie night with your friends in your nearest theater.
The moment you open our app you will be presented with a beautiful design showing off the trending movies, top rated and the current ones playing at theaters.

Along with top movies, you got the current popular actors. Do not worry as our team is always on the look out for new movies specially for you to discover.
Every list we present to you is updated daily even hourly depends on workload.

Once you are done with the movies list you can as well enjoy the series tab where you get to learn about the current trending shows.
Give it a try and you will see how easy and great that is.
If you just want to learn about a specific movie you simply head straight to the search layout.
There you get to search by, title, actors and even genres and much more.

Find your nearest theaters with their movies table, we are currently working on adding tickets features.
So make sure to keep checking for future updates.

Features:
• Discover and track thousands of great movies and TV shows.
• Learn more by watching trailers and behind scene videos.
• Search Movies By Genres, actors.
• Find your nearest theaters with their movies table
• Find near by Theaters with movies and timetables.

Please note that our app used the TMDB services but not sponsored or endorsed by TMDB.
These services are licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0

apps.title: MerlMovie
apps.description:
MerlMovie, your dedicated movie guide, is here to elevate your cinematic experience. Uncover the latest and upcoming releases seamlessly with a user-friendly interface, all powered by the reliable themoviedb.org database.

Key Features:

• Stay Ahead with Upcoming Releases: Be in the know about the hottest movies set to hit theaters.

• Explore and Discover: Delve into a diverse film library, exploring details about actors, directors, and genres.

• Powered by themoviedb.org: Access accurate and up-to-date movie information from the extensive themoviedb.org database.

• Release Dates and Trailers: Plan your movie nights effortlessly by checking release dates and watching trailers directly within the app.

• Personalized Watchlist: Tailor your movie experience by creating a watchlist to track the films you're eager to see.

• Intuitive Design: Enjoy a seamlessly designed app for easy navigation and a hassle-free movie discovery process.

Download MerlMovie now and unlock a world of cinematic wonders. Whether you're a fan of mainstream hits or hidden gems, MerlMovie is your essential companion for navigating the captivating world of movies. Let MerlMovie guide you through the magic of the silver screen!

MerlMovie does not require users to create an account, log in, or provide any authentication to access the App's basic functionalities.

apps.title: Movie Business F2P
apps.description:
MOVIE BUSINESS F2P (Free To Play) is a complete, free, ad-free game with optional in-app purchases.
A paid version of Movie Business is available on the App Store, without any in-app purchases, and includes difficulty level settings.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Create your own film studio and experience the history of cinema from 1927 to the present day.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREATE GREAT FILMS
Choose a genre, a topic and a environment.
Emphasize suspense, action, emotion or humor.
Recruit the writer, director and actors.
Split your budget between sets, costumes, music and special effects.
Make the right decisions during the 5 phases of film creation (initialization, development, pre-production, production and post-production).

THE BEST FILMS EARN MORE
Plan your marketing campaign and wait for the first reviews from journalists.
Earn money and win awards.

IMPROVE YOUR STUDIO
Invest in your studio to boost team performance.

LIVE CINEMA HISTORY
From 1927 to the present day, relive the great moments of cinema and take your place alongside the greatest.

apps.title: Shelf: music, books, movies
apps.description:
Shelf is a a visual summary of all your current interests. It’s like Spotify Wrapped, Letterboxd & Goodreads in one app.

~ Magically linked to the platforms you already use & love.
~ Keep track of you and your friends’ taste over time.
~ Keep up with friends through what they’re into and get their media recs.
~ Share updates about your obsessions, guilty pleasures, and elite taste.


HOW IT WORKS
-Securely log in with platforms you already use, like Spotify and Netflix (eek, time to text that ex).
-You’re in control. Customize what ends up on your Shelf and invite friends to keep up with you’re into.
-Watched something at the movie theater? Listened to a vinyl? You can manually add items by searching them up or dropping a link, too!

REACT TO FRIENDS’ UPDATES
-Discover moments you’d miss, like when you & your friend across the country are watching the same show.
-Send a reaction to your friend when they’re watching or reading something new.
-There’s no posting, and no pressure to get likes or followers like other platforms.

SHOWCASE YOUR TASTE
-Curate your public Shelf to showcase your elite taste.
-Customize with limited edition themes like Mean Girls pink and Olivia Rodrigo’s GUTS purple.
-Link to your Shelf wherever you want to flex.

GO BACK IN TIME
-What era are you in? Your Shelf creates an evolving time capsule of who you are.
-Shelf makes you a recap every week to compare with friends, featuring what you’ve been watching, reading, and listening to!
-View your full history and see how your taste is evolving.

CONTROL WHO SEES WHAT
-Have ultimate power of how you appear on Shelf with privacy controls.
-You control who sees what, and we safeguard your data with cutting-edge encryption tech.
-The creators of Shelf are pioneers behind people taking back control of their data from the big platforms. We’re data rights activists and will fight (and build) until we all have control and ownership over our own data (see more here: https://share.shelf.im/data-rights).

PPL LOVE SHELF
“Shelf is frfr my new addiction it’s so aesthetically pleasing” - lizzieqlsen
“I love shelf sm!!!! Literally one of my favorite apps on my phone” – nolexuaa
“I AM OBSESSED WITH THIS APP” - biainwonder

Shelf is created by a team in NYC and loved by people across the world!

apps.title: Movies Plus: Where To Watch
apps.description:
Have you ever watched a trailer for a new movie you wanted to see, but completely forgotten about it? Or you can't find where to watch, stream, rent or buy a movie?
Then Movies+ is the simple movie tracker is the app for you! You can't stream or watch any movies in this app, it's just an informational tool.

Movies+ adds to your movie watching experience by keeping you up to date with the latest info, tracking your watched status and alerting you to changes to all your favourite movies.

Simply search or browse for movies you want to watch, then add them to you watch list and we'll do all the hard work for you, we constantly check for production changes, new cast members and release date announcements or changes, then we let you know of any important changes to your favourite upcoming movies.

Never forget about a movie or be stuck looking for something to watch again! Movies+ will help you find out where to watch, stream, rent or buy all your favourite movies.

 - See similar movie recommendations,
 - Find out where to watch, stream, rent or buy movies,
 - Alerts for production changes, new cast/crew, and release date announcements, 
 - View trailers, and movie clips,
 - Mark movies watched/unwatched,
 - See all release dates, Theatre, DVD and Streaming,
 - View Movie details,
 - See Popular, Now Playing and Upcoming Movies,
 - Night/Dark mode,

Movies+ is funded by ads, if you choose to purchase Movies+ Pro to hide these ads, Premium notifications, and unlimited favourites and follows, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

Purchasing Movies+ Pro will not allow you to stream or watch any content, shows, or movies.

raw_data.description:
Have you ever watched a trailer for a new movie you wanted to see, but completely forgotten about it? Or you can't find where to watch, stream, rent or buy a movie?
Then Movies+ is the simple movie tracker is the app for you! You can't stream or watch any movies in this app, it's just an informational tool.

Movies+ adds to your movie watching experience by keeping you up to date with the latest info, tracking your watched status and alerting you to changes to all your favourite movies.

Simply search or browse for movies you want to watch, then add them to you watch list and we'll do all the hard work for you, we constantly check for production changes, new cast members and release date announcements or changes, then we let you know of any important changes to your favourite upcoming movies.

Never forget about a movie or be stuck looking for something to watch again! Movies+ will help you find out where to watch, stream, rent or buy all your favourite movies.

 - See similar movie recommendations,
 - Find out where to watch, stream, rent or buy movies,
 - Alerts for production changes, new cast/crew, and release date announcements, 
 - View trailers, and movie clips,
 - Mark movies watched/unwatched,
 - See all release dates, Theatre, DVD and Streaming,
 - View Movie details,
 - See Popular, Now Playing and Upcoming Movies,
 - Night/Dark mode,

Movies+ is funded by ads, if you choose to purchase Movies+ Pro to hide these ads, Premium notifications, and unlimited favourites and follows, payment will be charged to your iTunes account, and your account will be charged for renewal 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase.

Purchasing Movies+ Pro will not allow you to stream or watch any content, shows, or movies.

Find movie showtimes and information, watch movie trailers, purchase tickets in advance with reserved
seating, and access your Emagine Rewards account.

and convenience

apps.title: Guess the Movie ?
apps.description:
***** Now the #1 Free App in 10 Countries ***** 
Try and Guess the Movies from exceptionally beautiful, minimalistic posters!
******

The concept is simple, can you guess that movie based on a simplified poster of it?

We use some exceptionally beautiful posters with minimalist artwork to give you a clue to help you guess the movie.

We feature :
Hundreds of stunning, beautiful minimalist movie posters.
Multiple levels to test your skills.

Lots of Help Options :
- Use hints to Guess the Movie based on the plot summary for the movie itself.
- Use a second kind of hint to guess the movie name in hangman style.
- Finally, use our "Resolve" feature in case you get really stuck!

Guess the Movie App is an app made - of great movies, for the movie-lovers, by the movie-lovers!

All Poster Art is copyright of the respective artists/owners. To get copies visit the Artists linked to the Poster.

apps.title: Ziven : Movies & TV Shows
apps.description:
Embark on a groundbreaking entertainment journey with Ziven, a visionary marvel that transcends the traditional bounds of movie and TV show apps. Ziven isn't just a spectator's platform; it's your gateway to an immersive cinematic universe, redefining how you connect with the world of entertainment.

Discover the Unseen:
Embark on a cinematic odyssey with Ziven, a pioneering concept crafted to reshape your entertainment experience. Say goodbye to the ordinary as Ziven becomes your trusted companion through the mesmerizing galaxy of movies and TV shows.

Key Features That Make Ziven Stand Out:

Cinematic Adventure Planning: Immerse yourself in a unique movie planner that effortlessly transforms scheduling film escapades into a seamless experience, ensuring you never miss an enchanting movie night.

Effortless Movie Curation: Keep your favorite films impeccably organized and accessible with Ziven's user-friendly organization features.

Trendsetting Insights: Stay ahead of the cinematic curve with real-time updates on the latest movie and TV show trends.

Cinematic Exploration: Discover nearby theaters effortlessly, turning your movie outings into a breeze.

Instant Movie Discovery: Find specific movies in a flash with a single tap, saving you precious time and energy.

Comprehensive Movie Intel: Access critical details such as movie length, ratings, and all essential information needed to make informed choices.

Genre Immersion: Dive into an expansive sea of genres and categories to uncover the perfect film for your current mood.

Personalized Recommendations: Break the routine with tailored movie and TV show suggestions based on diverse criteria, ensuring a continuous flow of new, exciting content.

Disclaimer:
Ziven draws its data from TMDB.org, with all content licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0. Our app seamlessly operates through the TMDb API, strictly adhering to "fair use" principles outlined by U.S. law. For concerns about copyright or trademark issues not aligning with "fair use" guidelines, feel free to reach out directly. Ziven is the convergence of innovation and entertainment—here's to a joyous entertainment journey! Happy Exploring!

apps.title: Random Movie Picker
apps.description:
Can't decide what to watch?
Let Movie Picker Decide for you.
Simply give the carousel a spin and let fate (or in this case Movie Picker) find you a movie that you have not already watched.
Movie Picker gives you a ton of handmade lists spanning various genres, franchises, and film companies for you to work your way through. Work your way through the top 100 Horror movies for example, or simply binge all the films from your favorite filmmaker or actor.
Use Movie Picker to keep track of films that you've already watched enabling the app to more accurately suggest new films to you.
Not sure if a film will be good? Simply want to watch the trailer? Let Movie Picker inform you of everything there is to know about any film, from its Rotten Tomatoes or IMDB score to its cast and crew, to even letting you watch its trailer in-app.  

I made Movie Picker because I love films and I wanted to share that passion with others. You can follow along with the development of Movie Picker at: https://trello.com/b/3UQ6lwxp/movie-picker.
Any suggestions are always welcome, as I'm always trying to improve the app

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Version 4.5.0: Widgets!
• iOS Home Screen Widgets are now available! You can add a widget, which will show the most trending movie right on your Home Screen. 
• When you click on the widget it will take you straight to the app and to the movie for you to have a look at.
• Major performance improvements and stability fixes.

apps.title: hoichoi - Movies & Web Series
apps.description:
At hoichoi, the on-demand streaming platform for Bengalis worldwide, we bring stories to every screen, from Kolkata to California, Murshidabad to Mumbai. Bengali content isn’t just for private binge-watching, it’s a proud flex.

What to watch:

200+ original web series and 600+ movies across drama, thriller, comedy, romance, adventure, and more

Detective favourites: Byomkesh, Feluda, Eken Babu, Gora, Kiriti, Shabor, plus cult Bangladeshi thrillers

Blockbusters and classics: Prosenjit, Dev, Jeet, Abir, Parambrata, Mimi, Uttam Kumar, Soumitra Chatterjee, Suchitra Sen, Satyajit Ray, Rituparno Ghosh, Aparna Sen

Critically acclaimed originals: Advocate Achinta Aich, Birangana, Dainee, Bhog, Lojja, Noshtoneer, Srikanto, Dakghor, Mandaar, Sampurna, Kalraatri, Indu

Platform features:

Stream seamlessly on any device and on web at www.hoichoi.tv

Full HD streaming with English and Bengali subtitles

Personalized watchlist and app available in English and Bengali

hoichoi has grown from edgy to polished and proudly shareable, but our heart remains the same, stories that live, breathe, and shape today’s world. Explore your favorites and celebrate Bengali content like never before.

Boldly Bangali.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
hoichoi, naki palte geche?

Bikash da, a bus conductor, once said “change is the only constant” right after yelling “Khali Gari!” from a packed bus. Wise words from a master of creative truth-telling.

Just like Bikash da, we Bengalis love change. Playlists shuffling from Rabindra Sangeet to Rock, debates moving from para adda to social media? How could hoichoi stay behind?

Consider this our pujor jama. Same soul, sharper style, deeper roots. And just like a new outfit, we have stitched up the loose threads too. Here's what is proudly fixed:

Refreshed UI for a smoother, more intuitive experience

Bug fixes to keep the app running seamlessly

So, whether it is smoother logins or smarter search, every corner of the app has had a polish. Unleash your inner Shankar to explore, channel your Feluda to observe, and be like Byomkesh. Make some cha and investigate.

apps.title: HappyShort - Dramas & Movies
apps.description:
Never have enough time to finish a movie anymore? Tired of paying for subscriptions that you don’t use? Watch HappyShort - Every Second is a Drama.

HappyShort - designed for vertical screen viewing, the ultimate app for lovers of short, snappy dramas. With each episode lasting just one thrilling minute, it is easy for you to watch on the go. You'll be hooked on the latest tales from the world, such as modern CEOs, time-travel, comedy, vengeance, thrillers, and more. Whatever trending genre you're looking for, HappyShort has got you covered. Choose from our TV mini series library packed with endless addictive movie shorts added daily, from romantic encounters with billionaires and heart-wrenching tragedies to epic comeback stories and more—you won't ever be short on short movie entertainment!

Indulge in a Tapestry of Genres
With HappyShort, you'll relish an assortment of genres spanning drama, romance, suspense, and thrilling mysteries. Embark on time-travel adventures, unravel enigmatic cases, or get swept away in the fantasy of romance with a pretend billionaire. Our collection of stories is as vast as your imagination!

Lose Yourself in Miniature Dramas
In just minutes, you'll be completely absorbed in these enthralling short narratives, igniting your passion for drama like never before.

Unveiling Exclusive Selection
HappyShort proudly presents a meticulously curated assortment of short plays. Each episode is carefully crafted, brimming with creativity, emotion, and depth, designed to transport you effortlessly into a multitude of imaginative realms.

Here's What Awaits You on HappyShort:
- An Array of Genres
From inspirational comebacks to enigmatic time-travel adventures, from the allure of ancient tales to modern love stories, HappyShort caters to every drama preference you desire.

- Tailored Recommendations
Our smart recommendation system ensures you easily find shows tailored to your tastes.

- Effortless Viewing Experience
With each short drama lasting just minutes, you can seamlessly enjoy them during your commute, breaks, or moments of leisure.

- Exclusive Original Content
Engage with bite-sized, drama-packed original shows that will keep you coming back for more. The entertainment never stops!

- Always Fresh
Stay up-to-date with real-time updates, ensuring a steady stream of the hottest short dramas and movies. Discover new favorites every week!

- Your One-Stop Platform
HappyShort simplifies your viewing journey by providing a unified platform, eliminating the inconvenience of switching between sources.

- Visual Brilliance
Delight in high-definition visuals that capture every detail, creating an immersive feast for your eyes.

Experience the future of short movie entertainment, one minute at a time — download HappyShort now!

Notice:
If you subscribe through Apple, the payment will be deducted from your App Store account upon purchase confirmation.
Subscription privileges: While your subscription is active, you can watch all tv mini series for free.
Your subscription will take effect within 24 hours after purchase, depending on the status of your order in the Apple Store. The subscription is valid for 7 days.
Auto-Renewal: Your subscription will automatically renew. You will be charged within 24 hours before the start of each subscription period until you cancel your subscription.
Cancellation: On iOS devices, you can cancel your subscription at least 24 hours before the next renewal date by going to Settings > iTunes & App Store > Apple ID > View Apple ID > Subscriptions > HappyShort.
The subscription is billed weekly. The actual price may vary by region.
Privacy Policy: https://api.tqshort.com/info_ios/privacy-policy-241010-nmkk.html
User agreement: http://api.tqshort.com/tqvideo-oss/hai-user.html

FlixLatino brings a world of shows and movies in Spanish to your iOS device. Watch films, series, and live TV channels that cater to all Latino/Hispanic tastes and cultures. Whether you're looking to watch Mexican cinema or binge-watch your favorite series, FlixLatino offers a streaming service that fits your needs. Watch TV and movies with FlixLatino Basic (No Ads), or FlixLatino Premium. Stream the best in Spanish entertainment.

Start watching Mexican movies and shows in Spanish with our FlixLatino Basic Plan plan. Upgrade anytime to enjoy content on multiple devices with FlixLatino Premium. Be a part of FlixLatino when you download and subscribe today.

WHY CHOOSE FLIXLATINO?

VAST SELECTION OF FILMS IN SPANISH
- Watch TV and movies in Spanish from Mexico & over 20 countries.

MEXICAN CINEMA WITH FLEXIBLE STREAMING
- Watch Spanish movies and live TV on any device—your phone, tablet, or TV—anytime, anywhere.

EXCLUSIVE CONTENT
- Access unique Latino films and series not available on other streaming services.

BASIC PLAN - AD-FREE LATINO MEDIA
- Enjoy the FlixLatino Basic Plan for an uninterrupted, ad-free streaming experience.
- For $4.99 a month, watch Mexican films and live tv channels from our catalog on your favorite device. 
- Discover kid-friendly content for the whole family to watch TV and movies in Spanish.

PREMIUM- WATCH ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
- Our most popular viewing experience.
- For $5.99 a month, stream on up to four devices simultaneously.
- Watch TV series and Spanish movies and download content to watch on the go, all without ads.

Whether you want to watch movies or TV shows in Spanish, FlixLatino Premium delivers the best of both worlds.

Download FlixLatino now and enjoy a premium streaming service that brings the best Latino movies to your fingertips.

- Personalized Favorites: Create your own curated list of favorite movies for easy access whenever you want to indulge in your preferred genres.

apps.title: MovieBox : Movies, TV Shows
apps.description:
Tshow is your all-in-one movie and TV show companion — helping you explore titles, learn about your favorite stars, and even test your entertainment IQ with fun quizzes!

From trailers and ratings to cast details and streaming info, Tshow brings everything together in a clean and easy-to-use experience.

- What You Can Do with Tshow:
- Discover trending, upcoming & top-rated titles
- Watch trailers and video promos
- View Celebrity Profiles with bios, images & filmography
- Play Filmy Quizzes and challenge your movie knowledge
- Browse overviews, genres, and ratings
- Create and manage your personal watchlist
- See streaming availability (Premium feature)

Whether you're planning your next movie night or just browsing what’s new — Tshow helps you stay informed and entertained.

Data Source
This product uses the TMDb API to provide movie and TV show metadata.
It is not endorsed or certified by TMDb.
https://www.themoviedb.org

!Disclaimer
Tshow does not stream or host any full-length content.
It is intended for informational and discovery purposes only.
All content rights and trademarks belong to their respective owners.

apps.title: Sling: Live TV, Sports & News
apps.description:
Stream live TV, sports, news, popular shows, movies & more with Sling TV. Customize your channel lineup and explore thousands of movies and shows On Demand. No hidden fees, no long-term contracts, and no more cable. Pause or customize your live TV streaming service at any time. Try Sling Freestream with hundreds of free Live TV channels, no credit card required.




Sling TV Channel Lineups
Choose from multiple base subscriptions, with the flexibility to change based on your viewing needs.
Add Extra TV channel collections based on your interests.
Plus, hundreds of free Live TV channels, with Sling Freestream.



Live Sports
Sling TV has live sports you can’t do without. Watch NCAA college basketball, NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, college football, MLS soccer, golf, NASCAR, combat sports and more. Catch your favorite live sports on ESPN, ESPN2, ESPN3, TNT, TBS and many more of the top channels on Sling. From college games to pro, soccer to football, it’s all on Sling TV!



Live News
Sling keeps you up to date on breaking news with channels like CNN, FOX, and Bloomberg, plus free channels like ABC News Live. Get the latest news headlines in the U.S and around the world. Add the News Extra package to get breaking news from trusted national networks, financial and economic news and diverse news channels.



Shows, Movies, and Premium Streaming Services
Stream today’s most popular shows and movies live and On Demand. Sign up and start watching channels like Freeform, TBS, TNT and so much more. Customize your channel lineup with premium streaming services like STARZ, AMC+, SHOWTIME, and Hallmark Movies Now.



Free Live TV Channels, Shows, Movies and News
Stay informed and entertained with thousands of hours of FREE live TV channels and On Demand TV and movies with Sling Freestream. No credit card required. Stream full seasons of hit shows like Hell’s Kitchen or Forensic Files, watch free movies and see what’s trending for paid Sling subscribers. Simply sign up for a Sling Freestream account on our website and get started with your free TV streaming experience!



Lifestyle
Get your daily dose of gossip, home envy, competition and reality drama. Take on DIY projects with HGTV and satisfy your cravings for new recipes with the Food Network. Plus, get access to Hallmark, Cooking Channel, truTV, TBS and more.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
