apps.title: trakt.TV Shows & Movies
apps.description:
Trakt is a community of TV and movie lovers. It's free to join!

TRACK shows and movies you watch.
DISCOVER what's hot and where to stream it.
SHARE comments, recommendations, and ratings.

TRACK
- Check in to shows and movies you're watching.
- We index over 1 million shows and movies.
- Mark episodes and movies you've previously watched.
- Detailed history of everything you've watched.
- Import metadata from IMDb, Plex, Letterboxd, TV Time.

DISCOVER
- See what's trending in real time.
- Browse anticipated shows and movies.
- See what's popular in the community.
- Advanced filters to find exactly what you're looking for. (VIP only)
- Saved filters add new cards for quick access (VIP only)

FIND WHERE TO STREAM
- We partner with JustWatch to provide direct streaming links.
- Hundreds of streaming services are indexed worldwide.
- Select your favorite services and bump those to the top.

LISTS
- Watchlist to track what you want to watch.
- Personal lists to organize things however you want.
- Recommended lists from the community.
- Unlimited lists and expanded item limits. (VIP only)

CALENDAR
- Personalized and global calendars of episodes and movies.

STATS
- Personalized stats about your watching habits.
- Year in review for each year you've watched something. (VIP only)
- All time stats to summarize your entire watching career. (VIP only)

SHOW PROGRESS
- Quickly see what you should watch next.
- Get super detailed progress about episodes you've watched and what's left.
- View show, season, and episodes and how many times you've watched them.
- Rewatch shows and recalculate progress. (VIP only)

SEARCH
- Search for shows, movies, episodes, people, and lists.
- Advanced filters to find exactly what you're looking for. (VIP only)

NOTIFICATIONS
- Push notifications when new episodes air.

SOCIAL
- See what your friends have been recently watching.
- Comment and rate what you've watched.
- Follow other members with similar interests.
- Automatically share what you're watching.

RECOMMENDATIONS
- Personalized show and movie recommendations.
- Recommend your favorites to others.

TRAKT VIP
- Support Trakt and unlock some awesome VIP features!
- VIP applies to all official Trakt apps and the Trakt website.
- No ads anywhere on Trakt.
- Year in review stats.
- Beta versions to test new features before anyone else.
- Advanced filtering and saved filters.
- Unlimited personal lists.
- Notes on list items.
- Rewatch shows and recalculate progress.
- VIP badge.

====

Trakt is hand crafted around the world.
We don’t sell your data and respect your privacy.

====

Web: https://trakt.tv
Help: https://forums.trakt.tv
Privacy Policy: https://trakt.tv/privacy
Terms of Service: https://trakt.tv/terms

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
raw_data.releaseNotes:
Trakt is now ready for iOS 26 and the all-new Liquid Glass design!
And that’s not all:
- Refreshed Search with trending movie and show searches, plus monthly birthday highlights.
- New comment reactions: express more than a like!
- Updated calendar actions: added “Drop Show” and removed “Hide from Calendar”.
- On iOS 26, Watching Now is back at the bottom and stays visible while you browse.

we provide you with a comprehensive short film experience and real-time recommendations for content that piques your interest. Watching ten short films in a day is no longer a dream.

apps.title: BYUtv: Stream Live TV & Movies
apps.description:
Watch TV anywhere at any time with BYUtv – Inspiring and wholesome, on demand TV shows, movies, and live programming for everyone in your family.

The TV shows and movies you and your family love are now all on the BYUtv app. 

With on-the-go video streaming and personalization features, watching your favorite BYUtv movies and TV shows has never been easier. Enjoy 24/7 live streams, BYU live sports streaming, and BYUtv originals like Studio C, Random Acts, and Relative Race You’ll be sure to find all of your favorite movies and original BYUtv television shows in one streaming app.

Bring the family together with BYUtv’s one-of-a-kind selection of heartwarming movies and shows and religious programming. On BYUtv, there’s something for everyone. 

Download BYUtv now to get access to all of your favorite programs and shows – live and on demand.

Check out all of BYUtv’s key features:

Steaming, Live, or On Demand
- Search all of your favorite BYUtv content
- TV Everywhere - update and track your viewing history across all BYUtv apps and websites
- Get custom notifications for your favorite shows, television events, and BYU sports programming
- Add movies and TV shows to your Favorites with your BYUtv account

BYUtv Children’s Movies and Kids TV Shows:
- Spend quality family time with BYUtv’s vast library of kids movies and TV shows
- Kids can take their favorite BYUtv programs anywhere they go
- Watch family-friendly shows like All-Round Champion, Ruby and the Well, and The Wizard of Paws
- BYUtv is perfect family viewing for everyone in your home

Faith-Based Programming with BYUtv:
- Always bringing feel-good movies and TV shows to inspire and uplift
- Faith and family come together with BYUtv’s original programming
- Stream every episode of The Chosen
- Enjoy Music & the Spoken Word featuring the Tabernacle Choir at Temple Square
- Watch the Gospel Music series Grace Notes
- Learn from the scripture study talk show Come Follow Up

Clean Comedy from BYUtv:
- Family can enjoy every season of the sketch comedy series Studio C
- Family-friendly sitcoms like Dwight in Shining Armor and 9 Years to Neptune

BYUtv Sports and Special Events:
- Watch all special events covered by BYUtv
- Stream your favorite BYU sports like football and basketball
- Watch BYU Sports Nation everywhere you go
- Enjoy complete access to BYUtv’s VOD library
 

Personalize your BYUtv Streaming Experience:
- Add Shows and Episodes to your Favorites with your BYUtv account
- Update and track your viewing history across all BYUtv apps and websites
- Share content via Twitter, Facebook, email, text message, etc.
- Get custom notifications for your favorite shows, television events, and BYU sports programming


Casting Capabilities:
- AppleTV and AirPlay enabled
- Chromecast and Google Cast enabled

Internet or cellular data connection required
Version 4.0 + requires iOS 10 or later
Compatible with all iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch models running iOS 10 or greater

BYUtv is available in English worldwide*.
For more information visit: www.byutv.org/apps
BYUtv privacy policy: https://www.byutv.org/privacy

apps.title: Castor: Movie Database
apps.description:
Castor is the best app to search for, discover, and follow movies, actors, and directors, learn everything about them, and receive notifications when updates happen.

For Movies:
- Search the database for both released and unreleased movies.
- Get all the details about a movie: release dates, genres, MPAA ratings, run time, language, and more. 
- View official trailers right in-app. 
- Find a movie to watch at home: Where to Watch shows you where you can rent, stream, or buy a movie. 
- Follow movies to get updates on release dates, new posters, new trailers, and when cast and crew are attached to a movie. 
- Pick Your Poster lets you view all the posters for a movie and select a different poster for movies you follow (Cast Members only).
- Share movies you're watching or excited to watch in your Instagram stories. 

For People:
- Search for people (cast & crew) and see what upcoming and released movies they are attached to. 
- Follow movies to get updates on new movies the are attached to. 

And more:
- Share movies and people with your friends. 
- Discover upcoming movies and movies in theaters now. 

Cast Membership:
- Cast Membership is a monthly subscription that enables exclusive features:
- Region Awareness lets you view a movie's details for a different region: perfect for connecting with friends in other regions or travel (Cast Members only).
- Pick Your Poster lets you see all of a movie's alternate posters (and pick a new one to set for movies you follow)
- Optionally receive notifications for movies you follow for new posters and on the day a movie is released
- Sync your follows with iCloud

Privacy Policy: https://castor.movie/privacy
Terms of Use: https://castor.movie/terms

raw_data.releaseNotes:
iCloud syncing for all of your followed movies and people is now free for all users - no Cast Membership required!

Other improvements and fixes:
- Added nominations and awards for movies in the movie view
- Fixed issue with Share to Instagram button being un-tappable on larger sized phones
- Fixed issue with filtering in home view

apps.title: Sunspot - Infinite Movies Hub
apps.description:
Discover the world of entertainment with Sunspot - Infinite Movies Hub! Our app is your go-to destination, providing you with the latest cinematic releases and theater hits, all conveniently accessible.

Whether you're in the mood for a cozy movie night or a laid-back viewing session, Sunspot - Infinite Movies Hub provides you with daily updates on the latest trending movies. Say farewell to the overwhelming selection, and allow Sunspot - Infinite Movies Hub to lead you on your next thrilling cinematic journey.

Features :

1. Effortlessly Organize Your Favorite Movies: Keep your cherished films neatly organized and readily accessible.
2. Stay in the Loop with Trending Movies & TV Shows: Keep up-to-date with the latest in the world of cinema and television.
3. Locate Nearby Cinemas with Ease: Find cinemas in your vicinity effortlessly, making movie outings a breeze.
4. Discover Movies reviews: Explore concise critiques and evaluations of Films and Tv Shows.
5. Swift One-Tap Movie Search: Easily find specific movies with a single tap, saving you time and effort.
6. Sneak Peek with Trailers & Overviews: Preview movies and shows before deciding to watch, ensuring you make the right choice.
7. Access Essential Movie Info: Learn about movie length, ratings, and all the details you need to make an informed selection.
8. Explore a Variety of Genres & Categories: Dive into a plethora of genres and categories to find the perfect film for your mood.
9. Get Random Movie and TV Show Recommendations: Discover new content based on various criteria, ensuring a fresh viewing experience.
And Much More: Explore additional features designed to enhance your movie and TV show experience!

Disclaimer:

Movie information and images are sourced from TMDB.org and are licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0.
We utilize the TMDb API to retrieve all movie data.
We strictly adhere to the "fair use" guidelines as per U.S. law. If you believe there is a direct infringement of copyright or trademark that does not align with the "fair use" principles, kindly contact us directly.

Welcome to DramaWave, a next-gen HD streaming platform offering exclusive vertical TV videos, series, and movies. Dive into 30,000+ Dramas Across 18 Languages — With Exclusive Hits You Can't Find Anywhere Else!
 
Why Choose DramaWave?
1. On-Screen Comments
Supports real-time on-screen comments during playback, allowing you to share reactions and engage with others while watching. 
2. Offline Viewing
You can download episodes and watch them offline anytime and anywhere — even without an internet connection.
3. Vertical Full-Screen Feed
Deliver immersive entertainment experiences. Personalized drama content via precise algorithms helps you quickly spot your favorite drama videos.
4. Quick and Gripping Dramas
Dive into drama-packed stories that deliver emotions and thrills in minutes — perfect for quick escapes or binge-worthy sessions.
5. Crystal-Clear Streaming
Immerse yourself in stunning 1080P resolution, ensuring every scene is vibrant and lifelike.
6. Fresh Originals, Weekly Updates
Stay entertained with exclusive new dramas added regularly. There's always something exciting waiting for you in the world of drama-centered entertainment.
7. Stream Anytime, Anywhere
Enjoy seamless streaming with rich visuals and sound, wherever life takes you.
8. Global Accessibility
Watch with multi-language subtitles, including English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, and Korean, bringing drama to everyone.
 
Unleash the Drama

apps.title: My Movies by Blu-ray.com
apps.description:
My Movies by Blu-ray.com is an app for the members of Blu-ray.com. Membership is 100% free meaning everyone can use this app. 

Some of the features:
* Download your movie and game collection and bring it with you. Filter your collection by a multitude of attributes and combine these to create custom filters. Use hashtags in the comment field when the available attributes are not enough.
* Scan bar codes and get detailed information about the movie and add it to your collection.
* Rate movies, just after you've seen it at the cinema.
* Rate games.
* Get the best deals.
* See current theatrical releases.
* A release calendar showing old, new and coming releases.
* A collectables calendar showing release dates of desirable editions, such as SteelBooks, DigiBooks, etc.

Movie collections supported:
* 4K Ultra HD, Blu-ray, DVD
* Digital movies such as: iTunes, Movies Anywhere, Ultra Violet, etc. 
* Theatrical movies

Game collections supported:
* PS5, PS4, PS3, PS Vita
* Xbox SX, Xbox One, Xbox 360
* Nintendo Switch 2, Nintendo Switch, Wii U, Wii, Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo DS, 
* Steam, PC Games

Music collections supported:
* iTunes music albums

raw_data.releaseNotes: - Bug fixes

apps.title: Classix
apps.description:
Dive into a treasure trove of thousands of classic movies and TV shows, handpicked to bring you the very best in timeless entertainment. From vintage comedies and thrilling dramas to iconic cartoons and family-friendly favorites, Classix has something for everyone to love.

Stream Anywhere, Anytime
With Classix, the golden age of Hollywood is always at your fingertips. Download now and enjoy an ever-growing library of classic content on any iOS, tvOS, or visionOS device.

WHAT YOU GET WITH CLASSIX
• A Curated Library: Watch classic movies and TV shows across every genre, from unforgettable Westerns and suspenseful mysteries to beloved cartoons and comedies.
• Live Channels: Stream 25 exclusive Classix Live TV Channels for a nostalgic trip through cinematic history.
• Tailored Recommendations: The more you watch, the better we get to know your favorites, offering personalized suggestions you’ll love.
• Your List, Your Way: Save your must-watch classics to your list and pick up right where you left off.

WHY CHOOSE CLASSIX+?
Get full access to our entire library of movies, TV shows, and 25 live TV channels.

FEATURES THAT MAKE STREAMING EASY
• Universal Search with Siri and tvOS Spotlight for effortless browsing.
• Picture-in-Picture support for watching while multitasking.
• Seamless streaming across all your Apple devices.

GENRES YOU’LL LOVE
• Family Fun: Animated classics and timeless tales for kids of all ages.
• Action & Adventure: Relive the golden days of Westerns and daring escapades.
• Drama & Romance: Lose yourself in moving performances and heartfelt stories.
• Thrills & Chills: Classic horror, noir, and suspense films that keep you on the edge of your seat.
• Comedy Gold: Laugh out loud with beloved comedies and sitcoms that never grow old.

Classix is your ultimate gateway to the past. Relive the charm, magic, and nostalgia of the classics — all in one place.

Download Classix today and rediscover the art of timeless entertainment!

Terms of Use: https://classixapp.com/terms

apps.title: iCollect Movies: DVD Tracker
apps.description:
iCollect Movies is the #1 app on the Apple App Store for managing your movie collection or inventory, whether at home, work, or school. This app works on all device sizes and syncs directly with our iPhone, iPad, Mac apps, as well as our apps on other platforms. Scan in or search for any movie you own or want and add them to your lists. Full of incredible features!

• Manage and inventory 4K, Blu-ray, HD-DVD, DVD, VHS, LaserDiscs, CED, digital files and much more!

• Loaded with millions of movies from around the world in our database.
• Full barcode scanning and database search.
• Automatic estimated values on many of our built-in collectible types.
• Cloud Backup
• Sync across multiple devices, including iPad, iPhone, Mac, and more.
• Supports input in any language and allows selections of any country and currency.
• Filters, sorting, and importing.
• Three different custom layouts.
• Exporting
• Multi-level sorting
• Shake to Select
• Default Field Data
• Customize which fields are displayed
• Section Counts
• Share your movie collection with friends or on social media like Facebook and Twitter.
• Format your Titles with A, An, or The removed.
• Extra features like colored Themes, Dark Mode support, and more.
• Every field is editable.
• Store up to four pictures per movie, including front, back, and inside images of movies.
• Personal details per movie including Loaned, Purchase Price, Purchase Date, Date Added, Personal Rating, Last Watched, Storage Location, Opened, Notes, Estimated Value, and more.
• Index bars and search for quick access in large movie collections.

This app is a completely new collecting experience, written from the ground up for iOS 18, the latest devices like iPhone 16, 16 Pro, 16 Pro Max, SE 2, iPad Pro, and full Universal iPhone/iPad support built-in and syncs directly to our Mac app. Our app was created with a cloud database backend designed specifically to allow each item to be stored with its own individual attributes.

We can import your movie collection from nearly anywhere: CLZ Movies, My Movies, Delicious Library, MovieBuddy, Letterboxd, Blu-ray.com, and much more. Just send us your import file and we'll get you rolling.

Note: Large collections require an in-app purchase to unlock unlimited storage. You will be prompted when you reach the limits of your selected collectible type.

Data provided by Discogs, TMDB, Amazon, Google, eBay, and users like you.

-------
PRIVACY INFO
-------
All of these are OPTIONAL when using our app.

Email Address: We only collect this if you enable Cloud Sync as a login user ID.
Contacts: We only use your contacts if you want us to for "Loaned To" fields.
Photos or Videos: We only use photos that you choose for your item details.
Camera: We only use this for barcode scanning.

None of your data is sold. See our Privacy Policy URL for details.

We do use Google Firebase for analytics and crash data. See their policies for additional details on what they may track about your device.

-------

TERMS OF USE: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
PRIVACY POLICY: https://www.icollecteverything.com/privacy-policy/

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Pro users: CSV importing has now been released! This includes custom collections.
- Pro users: Ads via notifications are now turned off by default.
- Fixed a bug where the tab bar count wasn't getting updated when doing a search on the Main or Wishlist collections.
- Fixed a bug where Sort by Season wasn't working properly.
- Fixed a bug where the app would crash sometimes when moving the last item from Wishlist to Main.

This app is a completely new collecting experience, written from the ground up for iOS 18, the latest devices like iPhone 16, 16 Pro, 16 Pro Max, SE 2, iPad Pro, and full Universal iPhone/iPad support built-in and syncs directly to our Mac app. Our app was created with a cloud database backend designed specifically to allow each item to be stored with its own individual attributes.

We can import your movie collection from nearly anywhere: CLZ Movies, My Movies, Delicious Library, MovieBuddy, Letterboxd, Blu-ray.com, and much more. Just send us your import file and we'll get you rolling.

Note: Large collections require an in-app purchase to unlock unlimited storage. You will be prompted when you reach the limits of your selected collectible type.

Data provided by Discogs, TMDB, Amazon, Google, eBay, and users like you.

-------
PRIVACY INFO
-------
All of these are OPTIONAL when using our app.

Email Address: We only collect this if you enable Cloud Sync as a login user ID.
Contacts: We only use your contacts if you want us to for "Loaned To" fields.
Photos or Videos: We only use photos that you choose for your item details.
Camera: We only use this for barcode scanning.

None of your data is sold. See our Privacy Policy URL for details.

We do use Google Firebase for analytics and crash data. See their policies for additional details on what they may track about your device.

-------

TERMS OF USE: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
PRIVACY POLICY: https://www.icollecteverything.com/privacy-policy/

apps.title: Must for Movies & TV
apps.description:
Must lets you rate, review and track movies and TV shows, connect with your friends, manage a movie wish list and discover movies and series tailored to your individual taste. With built-in machine learning and AI, explore a new truly personal Must Match movie rating system, based on ratings of other users with exactly the same taste as you.

Start your experience by creating and managing two movie lists: the movies you’ve watched and the movies you want to watch. When a movie is marked “watched”, you can rate it, write a short review of it and share it with friends. When a movie is marked “wanted”, our movie tracker will let you know when it becomes available.

In case of series, you can manage your viewing experience by season, per episode. Track TV shows produced by Netflix, HBO, FX, FOX, The CW, NBC and BBC. Must is going to notify you when new episodes are aired or available for streaming.

A home page will greet you with the list of most trending movies, recommended specifically for you films, as well as those movies that are currently playing in theaters. All movies and series available on Apple iTunes offer a direct link for your convenience. Watch the latest trailers or get inspired with a movie suggestion by checking film collections curated by Must editors.

An activity feed provides relevant account activity as well as keeps you informed about movies and series your friends have watched or want to watch, their ratings, comments and likes. Ask them questions, debate over opinions, make recommendations or invite them to the movies!

Your personal profile summarizes your watching activity, provides you with a social rank within Must and equips you with cool insights on your favorite actors and filmmakers, among other stats.

Connect with friends and other movie buffs outside of the app, with a public profile link (mustapp.com/@username), which you can share with them on social media. Direct linking is also enabled for any specific movie or series you’d like to recommend.

Whether you watch movies or watch TV shows, Must ensures that you get the most social experience to enjoy movies anywhere in the world!

raw_data.releaseNotes:
Performance improvements and bug fixes
Fixed the problem of playing trailers on the movie page

To everyone who has been writing to us with concerns about Must' well-being — thank you! The team and the app are alive and well, just having too much fun on an extended vacation. We are definitely coming back with new Must updates. Hugs to all!

apps.title: MyFlixer : Movies & Series Hub
apps.description:
Discover a world of cinematic delights with Myflixer! Say goodbye to endless movie choices and hello to your ultimate movie companion.

Our app seamlessly brings the latest cinematic wonders, fresh from the theaters, right to your fingertips.

Whether you're planning a cozy movie night or just looking for a casual watch, Myflixer ensures you have a handpicked selection of the hottest trending movies at your disposal, updated daily.

Key Features :

* Stay in the Know : Keep yourself up-to-date with the latest blockbuster movies and TV shows.
* Challenge Your Movie IQ : Test your cinematic knowledge and guess the titles of movies and TV shows in entertaining guessing games.
* Find Cinemas Nearby : Easily locate cinemas near your current location for a hassle-free movie-going experience.
* Movies Tailored to Your Mood : Receive personalized movie recommendations that match your current mood.
* Trivia Challenge : Dive into engaging movie and TV show trivia games to prove your cinephile expertise.
* Instant Movie Search : Quickly find specific movies with a single tap, making your movie hunt efficient and effortless.
* Trailers & Insights : Get a sneak peek and insightful overviews before deciding on your next movie.
* Essential Movie Info : Access all the essential details, including movie length, rating, and more, to help you make the perfect choice.
   And So Much More !

Explore a world of possibilities within the app and stay tuned for exciting upcoming features.

Download now and embark on your cinematic journey.

Disclaimer :

Movie information and images are sourced from TMDB.org, licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0.
We utilize the TMDb API to fetch all movie data.
We adhere to "fair use" guidelines as per US law. If you believe there is a direct copyright or trademark violation not in compliance with "fair use," please contact us directly.

raw_data.releaseNotes:
- Bug fixes for a smoother experience.

- Enhanced user interface and performance.

- Now compatible with iOS 15.4 and later (previous version required iOS 17.0 or later).

Enjoy the improved app !

apps.title: MovieFan: Idle Trivia Quiz
apps.description:
Do you consider yourself a moviegoer? Have you seen almost all the existing movies, TV series and cartoons? Then the Movie Fan app is for you!

MovieFan is fun idle trivia game for movie fans!
Reasons why you should start playing Movie Fan: 
- Hundreds of interesting questions; 
- separate levels for movies, TV series and cartoons - choose what you are more interested :)
- levels with actors - for the smartest moviegoers ;) 
- play on speed: the faster - the more stars!
- doubt - choose a hint; 
- compete with your friends and prove who is the real movieholic!

Don't lose your time! This is the most interesting warm-up for your brains.

Beware: this game can cause an excess of entertainment in your blood. Seek advice if you notice that your knowledge is rapidly increasing.

About PRO subscription

PRO subscription is charged weekly to your iTunes Account after your 3 days trial ends. Subscription will then auto-renew every week unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your iTunes Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. To stop auto-renewal, visit Account Settings in iTunes after purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

--------------------------

Privacy: https://fander.tv/privacy_policy.html#en
Terms: https://fander.tv/terms_of_Use.html#en

apps.title: MeloShort-Stream Movies&Dramas
apps.description:
Meloshort: Your Ultimate Destination for Popular Short Dramas and Must-Watch Mini-Series

In today’s fast-paced world, finding time to unwind and enjoy quality entertainment can be a challenge. That’s where Meloshort comes in — the ultimate app designed specifically for busy viewers like you, who crave engaging stories but have limited time. With episodes lasting just 1 to 2 minutes, Meloshort offers a vast and diverse library of popular short dramas and must-watch mini-series that perfectly fit into your fragmented schedule.
Whether you are commuting, grabbing a quick coffee break, or just squeezing in some entertainment between daily tasks, Meloshort lets you dive into cinematic-quality storytelling anytime, anywhere. Experience the grandeur of ancient costume dramas, the sweetness and charm of modern romances, the thrill of intense boss hero stories, or the gripping suspense of revenge thrillers — all in beautifully produced HD formats that bring these worlds to life on your screen.

Diverse Genres to Match Every Mood
Our ever-expanding collection covers a rich variety of genres, ensuring there is something for everyone:
- Sweet Pet Romance: Heartwarming stories filled with adorable love and tender moments.
- Emotional Sadomasochistic Passion: Complex, intense relationships full of raw emotion and drama.
- Thrilling Suspense Mysteries: Edge-of-your-seat narratives packed with twists and turns.
- Heartfelt Campus Stories: Relatable tales of youth, friendship, and first love.
- Urban Emotional Dramas: Deeply engaging stories that explore the complexities of modern city life.
With new episodes and series added every week, your watchlist will never run dry. Our smart recommendation engine learns your tastes and suggests fresh content tailored just for you, helping you discover your next favorite popular short drama or must-watch mini-series effortlessly.

Features Tailored for Your Viewing Pleasure
Meloshort isn’t just about great stories — it’s about making your viewing experience smooth, personalized, and enjoyable. Some of our key features include:
- Playback Speed Control: Adjust episode speed to match your viewing pace — slow down to savor moments or speed up when you’re short on time.
- Personal Watchlist: Easily organize and keep track of all the mini-series you want to watch.
- User-Friendly Interface: Navigate effortlessly through a sleek, intuitive design with stunning HD visuals that make every episode a pleasure to watch.

Global Appeal and Accessibility
Recognizing the global audience we serve, Meloshort supports:

Whether you're browsing the latest releases or diving into your favorite actor’s filmography, Reelora brings everything together in one easy-to-use app.

Reelora uses the TMDb API to deliver accurate and up-to-date movie and TV information.

The best movie app is finally here. Download and create your movie lists now!

apps.title: ShowPal Movies with Trakt.tv
apps.description:
This is the definitive movie tracker powered by Trakt.tv


ShowPal Movies is the best way to manage, discover and keep track of your movies. It's powered with Trakt so you can get all your up-to-date info synced in every device.

We have built a gesture driven interface so you can mark as watched, as favorite or even change the cover artwork with simple, intuitive finger gestures.

We don't want to bore you with the same interface, so you can customize the app by changing between two different layouts: Poster and Fanart. Hardcore users will love the condensed view option!
Once you have chosen the layout, you can customize the Poster and Fanart images with a simple swipe; browsing the images at full screen, and even save and share them.

You can also change the app's color scheme (Light and Dark) and choose from six different highlight colors.
Finally, you can use the tinted option to enhance the app’s UI. You can even make ShowPal automatically look different every day!

When you are in the mood for new movies, tap the add button to go to the Discovery area, where you can see our personal picks, trending and popular movies. If you're connected to Trakt.tv, you can also get recommendations based on your movies, as well as find out what movie your friends are watching.

We highly encourage you to create a Trakt.tv account; doing so will allow you to keep a backup of your watched history and also comment or rate your favorite movies. If you plan on using ShowPal both on your iPhone and your iPad, a Trakt.tv account is a must.

Enjoy!

And remember that if you're also a TV Show addict, you can keep track of your favorite TV Shows with ShowPal TV!

PLEASE NOTE: This app is meant to keep track of your favorite movies. You CANNOT VIEW movies within this app.

raw_data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes.

apps.title: MUBI: Stream Great Cinema
apps.description:
Welcome to MUBI: Apple TV App of the Year. Discover great films, from iconic directors to emerging artists. From everywhere around the world. Each carefully chosen by MUBI’s curators.

Stream or download beautiful movies, anytime. On any screen or device, anywhere.

SUBSCRIPTIONS

MUBI offers a monthly and a yearly auto-renewing subscription with a 7 day free trial period.

Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms and conditions: https://mubi.com/terms_of_service
Privacy policy: https://mubi.com/privacy_policy
Support: http://help.mubi.com

If you have any problems, comments or suggestions for improving our app, please contact us at support@mubi.com.

USER NOTES

A Wi-Fi connection is recommended for quality viewing and downloading of films. A weak cellular connection may result in interrupted playback.

   •  Recent Box Office rankings
   •  Revenue details of top-grossing films

   •  Comprehensive cast and crew details
    • Insightful reviews and earnings information
    • Latest movie-related news

Are you searching for the perfect movie currently showing in cinemas? Download our app to get an instant list of must-see films.

Step into the World of Movies:

Stay updated with the most recent box office rankings and delve into the cinema world by exploring which films are currently generating the highest revenue. Our app offers a plethora of additional features, including trailers, behind-the-scenes (BTS) footage, comprehensive details about the cast and crew, insightful reviews, earnings, and the latest movie-related news.

apps.title: WhatsMovie
apps.description:
The "WhatsMovie" App is a nice and simple app available Worldwide for knowing your favorite Movies and TV Shows on your favorite device. The "WhatsMovie" App is a community built movie and database. You can instantly explore thousands of movies and TV Shows on your mobile device anywhere and anytime. With WhatsMovie you can browse contents of The Movie Database. It allows to get information about movies, and their respective crew and cast as well.

The "WhatsMovie" App Features:-

- Explore and share Movies and TV shows and shows from various categories such as In theater Today, Upcoming, Most Popular, Top Rated and many more.
- Explore weekly trending movies and shows.
- Get ratings from all the major sites(IMDB, Rotten Tomatoes, Metacritic, TMDB) at the same place.
- Submit your movie/tv-show rate with one single click.
- Add your favorite movie/tv show for or quick reach.
- The app shows detailed information such as - Release date, Genres, Casts and Crews, Images, Awards, Collections, Reviews and many more.
- View actor/actresses profile.
- The app shows highest-grossing Movies/TV Shows of all time worldwide; an option to present results by year. 
- Quickly watch all the latest trailers available.
- Search online movies using the following categories: Now Playing, Top Box Office, Upcoming, Popular, Top-Rated

raw_data.releaseNotes: Introduced apple watch version
raw_data.description:
The "WhatsMovie" App is a nice and simple app available Worldwide for knowing your favorite Movies and TV Shows on your favorite device. The "WhatsMovie" App is a community built movie and database. You can instantly explore thousands of movies and TV Shows on your mobile device anywhere and anytime. With WhatsMovie you can browse contents of The Movie Database. It allows to get information about movies, and their respective crew and cast as well.

The "WhatsMovie" App Features:-

- Explore and share Movies and TV shows and shows from various categories such as In theater Today, Upcoming, Most Popular, Top Rated and many more.
- Explore weekly trending movies and shows.
- Get ratings from all the major sites(IMDB, Rotten Tomatoes, Metacritic, TMDB) at the same place.
- Submit your movie/tv-show rate with one single click.
- Add your favorite movie/tv show for or quick reach.
- The app shows detailed information such as - Release date, Genres, Casts and Crews, Images, Awards, Collections, Reviews and many more.
- View actor/actresses profile.
- The app shows highest-grossing Movies/TV Shows of all time worldwide; an option to present results by year. 
- Quickly watch all the latest trailers available.
- Search online movies using the following categories: Now Playing, Top Box Office, Upcoming, Popular, Top-Rated
- Get Recommended Movies/TV shows.
- Get Suggested Movies/TV shows.
- Discover movies by year(s) or by genre with customized sorting

This product uses the TMDB API but is not endorsed nor certified by TMDB.

apps.title: Movie Trivia •
apps.description:
Ready to test your Hollywood movies IQ!?

This game is a lot of fun. You'll be shown random movie backdrops and you need to guess the name of the movie. Sounds easy?

We feature :
10 different movie categories.
Over 1000 levels with varying difficulties.
Create your favorite movies list!
New levels added every week!

Lots of Help Options :
- Reveal a correct letter from the movie name
- Delete all the extra letters from the letter choices
- Skip the movie
- Seek help from friends
- We'll also provide useful hints along the way ;)

Get ready to test your Movie IQ!

All images are copyrighted by The Movie Database and we have all the necessary rights to use them.
